K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-1: da sha tsakrakshi ti garbha n'a ma ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-3: 'dus pa chen po las sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-8: bcom ldan 'das ri kha la de ya zhes bya ba drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-10: thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag ste; zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154a-13: de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-0: me tog gi sprin @154b chen po 'dus pa las me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-1: rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab po; ;lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab tu 'bab po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-3: char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-7: gos de dag las chos chen po'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa ni; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-8: dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-9: bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-10: ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-12: bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-13: shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-14: grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-16: ting nge 'dzin dang; gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-19: smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-20: 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-21: gzugs mi chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-22: tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:154b-23: 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-0: 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes @155a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-2: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-8: ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-15: chos kun chub pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-16: mtho ris su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-17: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-18: theg pa gsum la 'bab pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-19: chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra dang; chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-20: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-21: ngan song gsum las yongs su sgrol ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-25: mngon par shes pas rnam par rol ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-26: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-27: sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-28: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-29: spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155a-31: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-0: char rnam pa @155b sna tshogs mthong zhing de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro'ang thos par gyur nas de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-3: lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-4: yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de dag re re las kyang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-6: nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs su byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-7: 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can de dag so so nas phyogs bcu'i chu klung gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-8: yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de re re la'ang 'khor mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-10: 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-11: gang bsad pa la thug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:155b-12: btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de dag las yongs su thar bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-0: yid mi bde bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan @156a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-1: len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-2: gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang 'grangs shing ngoms par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-4: chad pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-8: nor rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-9: sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-10: sems can gang 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156a-12: 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag thams cad zhi nas rab tu bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas @156b sprin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-5: bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-8: tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-9: yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-11: gnod pa mang po rnams med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-16: log par phyogs pa dang yongs su bral te lhag par mi grang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-17: lhag par mi tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-18: rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-19: sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-20: bde ba'i yo byad dam pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-21: de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-22: ltas 'di lta bu gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs te de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-23: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang bo dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-25: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:156b-26: bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-0: bden la rab gnas thub pa @157a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-1: khyod; ;'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-2: mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-3: so so'i skye bo mang po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-4: sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug bsngal sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-6: sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-7: 'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-8: shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-9: theg pa chen por thams cad gzhol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-10: yang dag lta skye som nyi brgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-11: 'khor mang lha dang mi yi lus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-12: lhag par sa yi khams lci bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-13: rang gis mi theg gyur ba 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-14: ci yi rkyen gyis ltas 'di byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-15: lag mthil gnyis na nor bu'i las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-17: phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-18: sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba thob; ;'dren pas gsungs shig ci yi rkyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-20: spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-21: so so'i lus la brgyan pa gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-22: lha dang mi kun the tshom skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-23: ci yi rgyu dang ci yi rkyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-24: su zhig gang nas 'dir mchi na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-26: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-27: 'on te tshangs pa'am bdud lags sam; ;brgya byin lags sam su mchi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157a-28: 'dren pa chen pos bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-0: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces @157b bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-1: khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-3: sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-4: sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-5: da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-10: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-11: rjes su yi rang ba bskyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis 'dir 'ong bas mngon par shes pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyis yongs su brgyan pas nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-14: 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpog nus pa med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-16: rnam par grol ba'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig yongs su dag par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:157b-18: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-0: @158a *// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar rin po che thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-1: tshong ba mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-3: rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-4: rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-5: dge ba'i nan tan can la snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-6: lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-7: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba ltar sim pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-8: rkang med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-9: la ma ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs bu lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-10: 'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-11: smyos shing 'khrugs pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-12: nad kyis gzir ba la sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-13: rgas shing 'khogs pa la brten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-18: chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta bu'o; ;pha rol tu 'gro ba la gru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158a-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu khyad par can smin par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-0: dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyun @158b du 'bebs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-1: sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-2: tshul khrims srung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-3: brtson 'grus gzhig par dka' ba na rdo rje /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-5: bzod pa mi g-yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-6: bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-7: mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi phreng ba lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-8: shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-9: cis kyang mi chags pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-10: 'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba ni me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-11: mu stegs can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-12: lha'i bdud yongs su 'joms pa ni klu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-14: nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-15: 'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-16: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni chu dang pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-17: mi gtsang ba 'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pas glags mi gcod pa ni mtshon rnon po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-20: bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni gnyen nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-22: phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra las skyob pa ni 'obs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-24: nyan nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:158b-25: zhan cings nyam chung rnams sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-1: lam ring por 'gro ba ba la bsil grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-3: skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la cha grang lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-4: bkres pa rnams la 'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-5: gcer bu rnams la bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-6: tshe bas nyen pa rnams la sprin stug por gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-7: dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-8: 'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-10: lo tog rnams la char par gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-11: chu rnyog ma can rnams nor bu chu dang du gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-12: sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'gong bar byed pas spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-14: sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-15: ngo tsha ba la bskul zhing 'dzud pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-17: ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-18: nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-19: 'khru pa'i sman lta bur gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-20: sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-21: spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud pa'i 'khor lo lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-22: dmigs pa la sems sdug pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159a-23: bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-0: gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya @159b mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-1: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-2: sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag pa cha mtshon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-4: rtag tu bas ma gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-6: yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur pas ched du ma brtsams kyang chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-8: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de 'khor dang bcas te gnas 'dir phyir du nya bas 'od las 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-9: ltas sngar bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-11: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-12: 'khor mang po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:159b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-1: bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-2: rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-3: byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-4: sa chen ltar ni shin tu bzod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-5: zhe sdang khro ba'i sems kun bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-6: mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rab brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-8: bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis; ;rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-9: sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-10: yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-11: yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-12: rnyog pa can gyi sems can dgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-13: rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-14: ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-15: yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-16: ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-17: yun ring dka' thub spyad pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-18: thos nas 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-19: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-20: brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-21: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-22: tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-23: gzhan yang skye bo mang po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-24: bkres sko ma na 'chi kun las bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-25: so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-26: lus srog ma chags mang du btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-27: yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-28: sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160a-29: bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-0: skye bo rnams la thugs brtser @160b dgongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-1: so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-2: the tshom dra ba gcod la brtson //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-3: dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-4: 'dong ba thams cad ring du spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-5: 'dus byas mi rtag sdug bsngal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-6: bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-7: sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-9: de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-10: 'dod chags yongs su gcad par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-11: sems can gnas pa'i khams kun tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-12: rtag par thugs rje chen pos gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-13: byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-14: sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-15: sems can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-16: rnam par gzir ba dag gzigs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-18: de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-19: sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-20: bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-21: ji ltar ma ni bu gcig la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-22: byams pa'i sems kyi gso bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-23: sngon yang sems can ris kun la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-24: rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-25: de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-26: tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-27: ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-28: sems can don du ma bsngos med; ;de bas sems can thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-29: pha rol phyin pa drug mi gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-30: rtag tu dus ngan tha ma'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-31: bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:160b-32: da yang dus ngan tha ma'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-2: ngan par lta ba'i lta klu mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-3: gnod sbyin dag ni kun btul te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-4: the tshom gcod cing bder bkod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-5: rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-6: tshad med pa yi skye bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-7: byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-9: mchog gi bsod nams zhing du gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-10: dpe zla med pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-11: byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-12: tshad med grags pa chen po yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-13: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-14: de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-15: bdag gi don du bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-17: thub pa chen po spyan sngar lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-18: dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-19: rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-20: lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-21: byang chub spyod la nan tan bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-22: rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-23: thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-25: bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-26: gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-27: rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-28: thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-29: byang chub chen por 'bab cing gzhol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-30: kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-31: bzod pa ting nge 'dzin yang thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161a-32: kha cig zag pa kun zad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-0: 'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom @161b gyur; ;kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-1: kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-2: kha cig yang dag rigs bzhi thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-3: kha cig mthun pa'i bzod la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-5: kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-6: kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-7: de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-8: bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-9: bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-10: rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-11: mu stegs can gyi ris kun btul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-12: sems can dmyal ba byol song dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-13: yi dvags lha min rgyud kun bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-14: bde bas sems can bden pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-15: thams cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-16: nad dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-18: sems can mdongs shing 'thom pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-19: yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-20: nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-21: thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-22: bdag gi bya ba kun spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-23: lhags nas bcom ldan zhabs la thug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-24: dpag tu med pa'i zhing rnams na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-25: bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-26: thams cad khyod la kun bsngags bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-27: thos nas thams cad 'di ru lugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-28: thams cad mkhyen pa rgya mtsho yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-29: yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-30: sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:161b-31: mos pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-2: bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-3: tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-4: mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-5: bdag kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-6: de lta bu yi yi dam bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-8: bla med byang chub thob par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-9: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-10: bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'khor dang bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-13: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-14: dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci'ang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-15: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-16: so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162a-22: gdugs la sogs pa phul te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-0: @162b bdag cag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-3: de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa stan las langs nas gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g-yas pa phyung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-4: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-6: rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-7: gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-11: bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar du'i gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-15: skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:162b-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam pa de 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-1: kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-2: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-4: mi thams cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tshom 'dri bas yang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-7: bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-9: legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-10: ngas khyod la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-11: ji ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-13: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lnga shin tu rtogs par 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-15: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad par yang thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-17: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-19: seng ge rab tu bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting 'dzin la'ang shin tu gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163a-20: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la'ang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:163b-1: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshoms pa ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:164b-2: 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:164b-3: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te; ;gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mya ngan dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:164b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:165a-19: gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:165a-28: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:165a-29: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:166a-12: sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-0: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du @167a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-3: thams cad kyang dge ba srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-4: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-5: de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-7: snying rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-11: kun la snyoms pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-12: gcig la gcig phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-13: bde bar byed pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167a-18: mu ge dang yongs su bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-0: dus @167b ma yin pa'i rlung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-5: sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-6: de ltar skyes bu chen po de gal te rgya mtsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams cad rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang yongs su bral te rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-12: rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-15: rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-16: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:167b-18: de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-0: rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog ba lnga'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs @168a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-1: pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-2: phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis 'jigs pa byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-3: sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-4: rigs kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus mtshon gyis 'jigs pa de dag yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nad kyis 'jigs pa byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-6: sems can kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas sems can rnams rab tu bde ba thob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu ges 'jigs pa byung ste sems can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-8: kha btag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mu ges 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te sems can rnams kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-9: rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting nge 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-10: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168a-11: bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-0: rigs @168b kyi bu 'di de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-2: bde bar byed pa'i don la rab tu brtson pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-3: sngon 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-5: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed las zad mi shes pa'i yid ma chen po bcas te snying rje chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-6: mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-7: de ltar snying rje chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-8: mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed de zad mi shes pa'i yi dam bcas pas gong nas gong du 'phags pa'i shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-9: skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-10: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-12: de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-13: gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-14: 'dod pas yongs su gdungs par gyur pa dag sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-15: dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:168b-16: ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-1: ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-2: gnas gang dag na sems can gang bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-3: btung [?] bas phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-4: ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-5: btung ba dang ldan te mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-6: gnas gang dag na sems can gang bgo ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:169a-11: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel cing phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas mchod pa byas na ci dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175a-8: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro ba'i ded dpon yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175a-9: de ltar ched du ma byas par gong du rgyas par bshad pa'i yon tan chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175a-12: gal te 'ga' zhig gis byams pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175a-14: kun tu spyan ras gzigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175a-15: kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabs su song nas de dag gi mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-0: 'dod pa re @175b ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa bas 'ga' zhig gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-1: phyag byas na re ba'i smon lam thams cad myur du 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-4: bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can rnams kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-6: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-7: de ltar skyes bu chen po 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas smon lam shin tu brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-8: snying rje chen po dang; shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsgoms pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun bas khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas khyed kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-9: de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-14: dri za la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dug pa las langs nas ci nus su so so nas gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:175b-16: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-0: spos kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @176a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-1: chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-2: de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-4: nor bu rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-5: mu tig gi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-6: mu tig gi se mo do dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-9: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-12: gdugs la sogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-14: tshad med pa'i lha'i rdzas kyi rol mo snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-15: tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de dag slar bcom ldan 'das la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-17: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-18: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-19: yon tan chen po 'jig rten gtso la dbul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-20: mchog gi mchod pa 'di dag ba zhes su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-0: de la bcom ldan @176b 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-1: brtan pa'i blo dang rnam dag sems bskyed nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-2: sems can tshad med pa yi sdug bsngal bcil //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-3: rin chen dag ltar bde ba 'byung bar mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-4: rdo rje bzhin du the tshom dra ba gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-5: snying rje chen po'i blo can brtson 'grus kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-6: mchod pa dam pa bcom ldan 'das la dbul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-7: rgya mtsho ye shes sems can sdug bsngal sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-8: 'jigs pa med pas srid pa'i pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-11: bdag gis chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-14: dge bsnyen ma la sogs bdran pa 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-15: bsrung ba'i dran pa 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-18: nad ma mchis pa 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-26: mang du thos pa 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:176b-31: byang chub kyi yan lag dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-0: @177a *// theg pa chen po'i yang dag pa'i lam la gzhol ba'i 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-1: chos kyi sgron ma 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-2: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'phel ba dang; byams pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-3: snying rje chen po 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-4: rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-5: khams gsum du grags pa 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-6: khams gsum du chos kyi char 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-7: sa chen po thams cad kyi ro bro ba 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-8: sems can thams cad kyi mdangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-11: dge ba spyod pa 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-13: pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-17: mya ngan las 'da' ba 'phel pa la sogs pa thob par byed pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-21: bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-22: thos pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sngags chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177a-23: gzungs kyi tshig 'di bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas gzungs 'di thos te gzungs 'dis ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-1: lo tog gi bro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-3: char chu dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-9: bde ba 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-11: nor rdzas 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-12: mthu stobs 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-13: 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro; ;yang gzungs 'dis ni shes rab skye bas nyon mongs pa'i dgra'ang yongs su bcom par 'gyur ba'i sngags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-25: sate ni ha la tshim bho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-26: bi ba ro ka sha ba tshim bho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-27: au ba sha ma tshim bho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-29: pradzny'a sa ma mo ni ratna tshim bho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-31: bi she ma ba ri y'a tshim bho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-32: sh'a s'i ta la ma ba tshim bho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-33: bi aa dra so ta ma he le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-35: tsakra se; tsakra ba si le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-36: kshi li phi le ka ra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-38: ha se re pra r'a be /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-39: pa re tsa r'a bhandha ne /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-44: aa kha ta tha' ge khe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-46: thh'a re thha re; mi le ma dhe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-47: nan te ku le mi le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-51: ku ta sha ma ma la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:177b-54: hu r'u hu r'u hu r'u /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-3: ha ra kha ma re ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-5: srid pa'i dri ma sbyong ba dge bar gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-6: 'thab rtsod bskal pa zhi ba'ang dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-7: mi dge bsam pa sbyong ba dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-8: 'byung ba chen po sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-9: ngan par 'gro ba sbyong ba dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-10: sdig pa'i bag chags sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-11: re ba rdzogs par byed pa dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-12: lo tog smin par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi dge bar gsungs pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-15: dge bar gsungs 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-16: byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-20: bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-21: thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po gzungs kyi tshig 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis pas thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-22: gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas pa'i longs spyod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178a-24: gzungs 'dis ni chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas su @178b gyur pa dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-3: dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-4: gzungs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi lta bu yongs su rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-5: yun du gnas shing khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-8: gzungs kyi tshig 'di smras pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-9: ri kha la ti ya rab tu g-yos nas lha'i rol mo bye ba khrag khrig kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-12: rin po che tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs nas de'i tshe 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-13: de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na lha mo bkra shis chen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-14: dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-15: mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-16: brtan ma lha mo chen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:178b-17: chu can lha mo chen mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-0: 'od chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa lha mo 'byung ba chen po bzhi la dbang du gyur pa stong phrag bco brgyad 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang @179a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-7: bdag gis 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-12: mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-13: skyes bu chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-15: tha ma'i mtshan nyid dang; skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-18: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-22: rigs kyi bu; 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-24: tha ma'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-27: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-31: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni yon tan mang po dang ldan pas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179a-32: sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-0: rigs kyi bu 'di'ang de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs @179b char bzhin du 'bebs te sems can la sbyin pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-2: rin po che'i gling ltar rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-4: lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri ci tri la bsung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-5: me tog gis mdzes pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-7: seng ge'i rgyal po ni ri dvags thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad kyis bag tsha ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-8: zil gyis non pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-10: ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams cad yongs su sel ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:179b-12: nam thang ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su lam stor ba'i sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-0: gar 'gro bar dga' ba bzhin du phyin par 'gyur ba ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'ang ma rig pa'i mtshan mor theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston cing skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i lam la @180a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-3: sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-6: sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ltar rigs kyi bu 'di la'ang byang chub kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos thams cad ston pa'i gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-8: rin po che chen po'i ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni shin tu brtan cing ma god ma nyams pa bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir ma god pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-11: nam mkha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-13: 'di'ang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-14: rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-15: de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa bstod pa thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180a-17: rim gro byas nas rab tu dga' bas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la mig mi 'dzum par lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag @180b gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-1: skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-2: yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-3: dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-4: ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-5: sems can kun la bde ba rab tu byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-6: srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun las sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-7: tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs char phab nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-8: ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-9: brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa des //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-10: phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas shing brtags nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-11: thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-12: ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-13: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-14: nor bu rin po che yi 'od zer ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-15: sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-16: thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-17: mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-18: deng 'dir 'dus shing lhags par gyur pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-19: shin tu dpa' ba sa yi snying po ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-20: rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam rnam par ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-21: 'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung ba'i gter yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-22: 'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nga ro dbyangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-23: byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-24: sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso bo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-25: rnam par grol ba'i rin chen 'byung khungs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:180b-26: brtson 'grus brtan pa'i bsod nams rgya mtsho yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-0: @181a *// byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtse la mos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-1: sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-2: 'jigs pa srung ba'i 'obs dang mkhar yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-3: nam mkha' dang ba'i zla bzhin lam yang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-4: sa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-5: rdo rje ltar ni the tshom yongs su gcod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-6: rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-7: chu ltar sgrib pa thams cad 'dag par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-8: nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdugs su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-9: sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tsho bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-10: zhag gcig sa yi snying po'i ming brjod pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-11: grags pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-12: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig par du yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-13: blo can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-14: so so'i skye bo grol bar byed pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-15: nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'ching byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-16: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-17: ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-18: rkyen mang bcu gsum po yang rnam dag pas; ;mang po kun la ye shes nam mkha' bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-19: dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-20: skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshogs kyang bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-21: zhing rnams ji bzhin ting 'dzin der 'jug cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-22: bsam gtan bzhi po la yang rgyun du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-23: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181a-24: nyon mongs pa yi gdung ba rab tu sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-0: so so'i skye @181b po sngon gyi sdig pa'i las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-1: mchon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-2: rnam pa mang pos 'tshe zhing gsod gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-3: de dag kun nas rnam par grol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-4: sems can nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-5: sdug bsngal mang pos 'tshe zhing gdungs gyur pa //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-7: srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-8: sems can sdug bsngal 'khor lo rab bskor te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-9: gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-10: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-11: bzod cing byams pa'i sems la gnas par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-12: bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab 'jigs skrag byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-13: tshol ba mi rnyed rkyen gyis sdug pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-14: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-15: 'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-16: bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-17: tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-18: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-19: re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-20: yon tan so sor smos pa'i bzod rtsal dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-21: sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-22: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-23: re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-24: lo tog rtsi shing legs par 'dod pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-25: khye'u dang bu me gos dang bran khol phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-26: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:181b-27: re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-2: sa chen 'di yang mi gtong rab tu 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-3: de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo thog rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-4: snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-5: nyon mongs mang pos bsgribs par gyur nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-6: mi dge bcu yi las la mos pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-7: sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-8: mi dge nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-10: skye bo mang po dag la chos kyang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-11: sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-12: sems can kun la snying brtse bde bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-13: gal te bskal ba mang po brgya yi bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-14: de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-15: mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-16: de bas kun gyis bsti stang bcas pas mchod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-17: 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-18: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po stan las langs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-23: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182a-24: yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-0: bcom ldan 'das la zhu @182b gsol pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-1: the tshom nem nur ci mchis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-2: bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-5: khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes kyis mthong ba la thogs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-6: 'on kyang sems can la pan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-7: bde bar 'dod pa'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-10: de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-12: bdag sngon bskal pa bcu gsum du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-13: spyod pa dka' ba shin tu spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-14: so so'i skye bo kun don du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-15: 'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga gsal //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-23: mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-24: ci slad sangs rgyas zhing 'di kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-25: sdig pas dge ba nyams bgyis shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-26: blo can dag gis spangs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-27: ngan par spyod kun lhan cig gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-28: mtshams med sdig pa bgyid pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:182b-29: yang dag dam pa'i chos la skur //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-2: sdig pa bcu yi las bgyid cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-4: theg pa rnam gsum ring spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-5: sdig can dag la ngan 'gror gzhol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-6: ma rig pas ni bsgribs pa'i mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-8: sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab bskor te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-9: sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-10: ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-11: nyon mongs rdo rje lta bus bcad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-12: ji lta bur na gzungs dag 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-13: de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-14: bdag gis 'dren pa tshogs chen dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-15: mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-17: phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-18: yon tan mang po kun ldan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-19: byang chub lam la rab brtson pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-20: ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-21: sangs rgyas 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-26: khyod kyi sngon 'das pa'i dus na'ang chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag gi zhing na rnyog pa lnga'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu ba zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183a-28: khyod kyis dres pa'i don 'di dag la sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas shin tu rtogs shing khong du chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-0: spyod pa mang po @183b phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-2: bde ba'i don 'thob par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-5: rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-6: zhing 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung shin tu rgyas shing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i don dris pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-7: shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-10: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:183b-11: bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can @184a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-1: thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyir ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-2: 'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun gyis bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-3: mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur pa chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-4: rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas glags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-5: ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-6: skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi lta ba dang; ma rig pa'i mun nag thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-7: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-8: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-9: dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa la dbang zab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-10: dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong zhing mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-11: de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu bde bar bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-12: bag tsha ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-13: 'jigs skrag pa med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su phyin te sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-14: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-15: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184a-16: mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-1: yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad bdag gi dmag dang /
