K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-4: de na gnas pa'i mi mang po'ang mi bde bas 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-6: gcig la gcig smod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-8: g-yo sgyu dang; tshig rtsub par smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-11: ling tog can du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-12: nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-13: grang ba dang; tsha ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-14: ri mus rnam pa mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-19: dbang po ma tshang zhing yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-23: 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phongs shing brel te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-24: bdog pa thams cad yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-25: skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-26: 'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-28: mos pa ngan pa yongs su rgyas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-29: yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-30: de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:184b-32: drang dag na che ba dag 'dus nas gros su bgros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-0: @185a *// grong mi kun bsdus nas thams cad kyis mthun par rgyal bu gcig btus pa ni sngon sbyin pa rab tu byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-1: tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-3: shin tu dka' ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-4: mchog tu gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-5: dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag ma nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-6: lus byad che chung ran pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-8: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-9: phul du gyur pa'i mdog dam pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-10: thams cad kyis bkur sti dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-12: yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing lta 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-13: rang bzhin gyis drang zhing brtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-17: rtsal thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-18: ngang des pa'i bzod pas sems rab tu brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-19: btsun mo dam pa'i sras thu bor gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-20: spos dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i chus lus bkrus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-21: rin po ches brgyan pa'i gos dam pa spos kyis bdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gyon zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-22: nor bu rin po che spyi bo'i gtsug phud la btags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-23: rin po che'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gser gyi cod pan mgo la thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-24: rab tu yang la 'jam pa'i dar gyis bcings pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185a-25: gzhan yang nor bu rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-0: dngul la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas @185b pa'i rna cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-3: gdu bu la sogs pa thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-4: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i lham gyis rkang pa bteg pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-5: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i gdugs kyis steng gi bla bres bres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-7: drang srong thams cad kyis bsrung zhing 'dzin pa'i khri bshams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-8: brgya byin la sogs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing skyob pa; bzo shin tu mkhas pas las su byas pa'i gzhal med khang chen por sngon rgyal po snga ma 'dug 'dug pa'i khri la bzhag nas rgyal por bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-9: rgyal sar zhugs nas lha'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-11: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-12: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-13: grul bum gyi dbang pos srung zhing 'dzin pa'i dril bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-14: rnga chen po brdungs nas de'i sgras yul khams kun tu grags par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-15: rgyal rigs la sogs pa rigs chen po bzhi la gtogs pa'i mi tshad med pa snyed lus yang dag par bkrus nas gos gtsang ma gyon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-16: lag na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-19: nor bu rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:185b-26: beed'urya la sogs pa tshad med pa snyed thogs te rgyal po de la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-0: thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba'i 'am ze thams cad @186a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-1: kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-3: dbyangs dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis rgyal po de la bstod pa byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-4: legs par 'gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par gyur cig ces smon lam yang btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-5: bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po'i spyi bor gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-6: rgyal po snga ma'i blon po'i rigs la gtogs pa thos pa dang ldan zhing shes pa che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-9: mdzangs pa dag kyang ci rigs su blon por rim par phye ste bcug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-10: rgyal po'i las byed pas sngon yul de na bdag dang; gzhan gyi dmag thams cad kyis gtse bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-12: grogs po ngan pa thams cad med par byas nas phas rgol ba'i dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-13: gnod pa byed pa thams cad zhi bar gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-14: nag po'i phyogs thams cad byang zhing rnam par dkar ba'i phyogs thams cad skyes te 'phel bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-16: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de lta bu'i 'khor lo gcig dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186a-17: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi rgyal srid rab tu che zhing phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad shin tu thul ba las tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-0: de bzhin du rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas mi bzhugs @186b pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-1: de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad rang gi sems kyi bag la nyal ba'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bcings nas nang gi dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-2: pha rol gyi dgras rnam par gtses te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-3: kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs nas gti mug gis ldongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-4: mi bde bar gyur pas rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-5: chad pa la rnam par zhen cing chags pa tshad med pa bskyed nas phan tshun rtsod cing 'gal bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-6: gcig la gcig dbang za zhing smod pas 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-10: sgyu'i tshul du smra zhing mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-11: rnam par zhen cing chags pa'i skye bo dag nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig ldongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-13: khong khro bas gdungs shing 'khrugs kyang yang dag pa bden pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-14: yang dag pa'i chos kyi ro yongs su gtang nas dge ba byed pa la dbang za zhing smod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-15: de sngar bde zhing skyid pas ni bral cing phongs par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-16: rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i dra ba rnam pa mang pos dkris shing glags nas mu stegs can gyi ston pa rnam pa drug po la skyabs su song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:186b-17: 'phags pa'i lam las phyir log cing ngan song gsum las gzhol bar 'gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-0: de'i tshe zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems @187a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-1: dpa' chen po sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing pa snyen bkur byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-2: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-3: snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la gnas pa thams cad 'dus shing tshogs nas nga'i spyan sngar lhags te tshig mthun par 'di skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-4: khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sbyin pa tshad med pa la nan tan byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-5: tshul khrims rab tu bsrungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-6: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-7: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bsgoms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-8: de lta bu'i bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-12: snying rje chen po la sogs pas yongs su brgyan pas yon tan chen po'i gter du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-14: gzungs rnams las rab tu bzod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-15: sa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-17: sgyu med cing lus byad shin tu ring la mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-18: dpe byad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-19: des pa'i bzod pa dang ldan zhing shin tu mdzes par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-20: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'brang bas byang chub kyi lam bsgom par ye shes kyi rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187a-21: phul du gyur ba'i mdog mchog dam pa dang ldan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-0: rang @187b sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ston pa chen por gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-1: 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-3: snying rje chen po la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pas yongs su brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-4: bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-6: 'od srung la sogs pa'i sras yang dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-7: bskal pa bzang po 'dir mngon par 'tshang rgya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-9: yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-11: lhag mthong gi chu yongs su dag pas khrus byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-14: rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings gtsug gi nor bur thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya chen po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i cod pan thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-16: rnam par grol ba'i srad bus cings pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-19: mi skye ba'i bzod pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi rin po che yongs su brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-23: btang snyoms kyi lham rin po che gyon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:187b-24: khams gsum yongs su khebs pa'i spyod pa rnam gsum gyis 'phags pa'i rgyu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i gdugs kyis bkab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-0: drang srong gis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gdan ba shams @188a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-2: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bkur sti dang bcas te yongs su bzung ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bzhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-3: sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-5: chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs nas khams gsum kun tu chos kyi sgra bsgrags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-8: gnod sbyin dang; srin po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-19: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis grol bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-20: yan lag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gang 'jig rten du bcas pa dge sbyong dang; bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-25: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang ma bskor ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-26: 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-27: mi tshad med pa dag la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188a-28: bde ba'i don chen po mchog dam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sngon gang gis kyang ma bskor ba de rnam pa gsum du rab tu bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-0: nga de lta bu'i sangs @188b rgyas kyi 'khor lo gcig pa de dang ldan te 'khor lo de'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-3: gnas ma yin pa mngon sum du mkhyen pas 'jigs pa med pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-4: bde bar gnas shing lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-5: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad shin tu btul nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor lo bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-6: tshangs pa chen po'i spyod pa shin tu grub pas nga ni rnyog pa lnga'i sdig pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-7: sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i las zhi bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-8: de bzhin du mi dge ba'i rtsa bar gtogs pa thams cad bsal nas skye bo thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyun rdo rje ltar sra ba dag kyang zhi bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-9: zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu dam pa la rnam par bzhag nas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-10: ci la mos pa bzhin du thams cad bde bar 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-11: mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum la bzhag ste phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:188b-14: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po theg ma rgyal sar zhugs nas rgyal po'i srid bzung ma thag tu 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-0: da ltar gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis chos @189a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-1: dang; khrims la shin tu lta zhing rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-2: de ltar rgyal po kun gyi las kyi 'khor lo shin tu rtogs nas rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-5: cir ldan pa bzhin de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-6: de lta bu'i thabs byin te las su bcug pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-7: yul de na gnas pa'i mdzangs ngan las las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-8: las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad yun ring po'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs la longs spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-9: bde skyid 'phel zhing skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-10: phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad kyang thul bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-11: las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-13: rgyal po srid kyi las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang dgra thabs mkhas par bslabs shing rtsal sbyangs te phas rgol ba'i dgra 'dul zhing mi mang po srung bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-15: gnas byed pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang khang khyim brtsig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-16: zhing gi las lag byad kyis phyin par byed du 'jug cing bde bar byas pas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-17: btung bas mi brel bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189a-18: nor rin po che tshol pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pas gang tshong spogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-0: bzo rnam pa sna tshogs slob tu gzhug cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du spyad du @189b yod la bde zhing skyid pa 'phel bar byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-2: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po rgyal pa'i 'khor lo gsum po 'di dang ldan na 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-4: grogs po ngan pa btul zhing lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe 'ang ring bar 'gyur ro; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-5: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bla na med pa'i ye shes thob nas 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-7: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mig la shin tu rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-8: de ltar shin tu brtags pas las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-11: 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can thams cad la las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum rnam par bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-12: las kyi 'khor lo de'i dbang gis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-13: chos kyi mig yun ring du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-14: bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos rgya cher kun tu khyab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-15: skye bo thams cad rtag tu mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du shin tu bde ba thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:189b-16: mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig gis phas rgol ba thams cad chos bzhin du thul bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-0: las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gang @190a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-3: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par gzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-4: kha ton goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-5: bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bzhag pa dang gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-7: de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-8: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bcu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-10: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus 'di la brtags na yul drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-12: bdag gir zhen cing chags pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-14: ma rig pas bsgribs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-15: sred pa'i chus brlan pa'i dbang med par gzhan gyi dbang gis yod par gyur pas rkyen mang po la rag las pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-18: sdug bsngal gyi rgyun rnam pa gsum po dgag pa'i phyir de ltar brtag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-19: las kyi rgyun gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-20: gang sems can rnams ji snyed kyi 'du byed mngon du spyod pa de ma rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-21: sred pa'i rgyu las srid pa skye bas nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-22: nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-23: rkyen mang po 'dus pa las ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-27: rkyen mang po 'dus pa las skye mched drug skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190a-28: skye mched drug gi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-0: rkyen mang po 'dus @190b pa las reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-2: srid pa phyi ma'i skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-4: 'chi ba la sog pa rim kyis 'byung ba na sdug bsngal gyi rgyun ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-5: da ltar rgyun gsum po 'di ni las kyi zhing la ma rig pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-6: sred pa'i rlan gyis skye bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-7: 'di ltar las kyi zhing lam rig pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-8: sred pa'i rlan gyis rgyun rnam pa gsum po brkam pa'i phyir nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-14: smig rgyu ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-15: chu'i zla ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-16: rmi lam lta bu stong pa ci'ang med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-26: skye ba'i gnas med par rtogs so; ;de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la shin tu brtags pas stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-27: mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-28: smon pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa la phyogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-29: yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rjes su brtag par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-31: thabs mkhas pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ste nang du rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-32: phyir rgyu ba'i dran pa goms par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:190b-33: de la ji ltar na dran pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-1: ba bzhin du bgrang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-6: yongs su dag pa la rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-7: de la bgrang bas ni las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-8: rten du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-9: rnam par dpyod pa rnams thul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-10: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin par nus pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-11: rjes su 'brang bas kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-12: yang dag par 'byung ba la rten cing rnam par rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-13: rnam par dpyod pa dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-14: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-15: zhi gnas kyis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-16: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bri bar mngon du ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog la gnas par nus pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-18: lhag mthong gis kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-19: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba zad par mngon du ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-21: sems las byung ba'i chos so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-22: 'jug pas kyang las kyi dngos po rnam pa gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-23: nye bar len pa'i phung po spong ba'i sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191a-24: 'phags pa'i sar 'jug pa la sbyor ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-0: yongs su dag pas kyang bya ba'i @191b las kyi dngos po gnyis byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-1: kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-2: lta ba yongs su dag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-3: de ltar sbyor ba rnam pa drug gis dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba la rtog pa bsgoms pas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rtogs pa dang rjes su mthun par 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-5: ji ltar dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin ni gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-6: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba len cing myong bar byed pa ni tshor ba nye bar len pa'i phung po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-7: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid len pa ni 'du shes nye bar len pa'i phung po'o; ;dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mngon du byed pa ni 'du byed nye bar len pa'i phung po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-8: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bye brag tu 'byed pa ni rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-9: de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam lnga bshad pa ni so so ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-15: spungs pa med pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-17: de ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga shin tu rtogs pas 'du byed rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-18: gal te de lta 'du byed rnam pa gsum yongs su zad par rjes su brtags pa'i mthar phyin na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:191b-19: yul drug rjes su rtogs pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-6: kun nas 'gebs pa'i rlon pa'ang thams cad zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-7: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs pa nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-8: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-9: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-10: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-11: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-13: 'ong ba rjes su dran pas gzung bar bsam gtan dag la zhugs pa ni yang dag pa'i chos don dam pa la gnas pa'i sems can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-14: bsam gtan yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgom pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-15: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-16: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las byung ba'i sras /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192a-17: thams cad kyi gsung las skyes pa; chos kyi grub pas chos kyi btul ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-0: byang chub sems dpa' la las de ltar bsgoms pa las bags kyis phyir nur na'ang zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom par @192b gyur pa nas mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-1: byang chub sems dpa' la la de ltar bsgoms pas gong nas gong du 'phar ba ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-4: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-6: ngas rnam pa de snyed kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-11: rnam par smin pa la ye shes kyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtags na sems can dag ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo bcu rnam par bzhag la sgom du 'dzud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-13: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-15: de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-21: rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing srab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:192b-22: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas pa dbang po yongs su ma smin pa dag la ngas kha ton goms par bya ba la btsud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-1: le le med par shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-2: sems can gang bla na med pa'i ye shes tshol ba dag ni ngas rnam par dkar pa'i theg pa chen po la btsud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-4: pha rol po gzhan klog tu 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-6: pha rol po gzhan 'don du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-8: pha rol po gzhan 'chad du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-9: theg pa chen po la bdag goms par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-10: pha rol po gzhan goms par byed du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-12: gzhan gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-13: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-14: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-15: 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer chen por zhugs pa'i phyir rtsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-16: sems can gang rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa 'dod pa dag ni ngas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos la btsud nas kha ton goms par byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-17: sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dag la ni ngas gzhung tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgya pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-18: 'dul ba tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgya pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193a-20: mngon par smra ba tshigs su bcad pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa kha ton goms par byed du bcug pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha ton goms par bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-3: de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi 'khor lo zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-5: sems can gang dbang po rtul pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-9: dran pa nyams pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam ba kun la zhen cing chags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dag ni ngas bsod nams bya ba'i las la btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-14: dge 'dun la bya ba byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-16: slob dpon la bya ba byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-18: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams sgrub pa'i las kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-20: de ltar nga ni sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-21: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bla na med pa'i dus gsum gyi las kyi ye shes kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-25: 'bras bu yongs su smin pa mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-26: cis 'dul ba bzhin du las kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum rnam par bzhag nas snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:193b-28: 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-1: du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor lo bskor zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-2: tshangs pa chen po'i spyad pa yongs su grub pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-3: 'bras bu kun mngon par mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-6: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po ni thabs mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pas dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-10: dmangs rigs la sogs pa yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-15: sems can gang phyug cing yon tan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-16: thabs mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-18: brtan pa phyir mi ldog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-19: bsod nams rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa de dag la rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen pos de dag ci dang ldan pa bzhin ci 'os ci rigs su rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-24: las byed pa'i mi la sogs pa ci rigs su sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194a-25: yul de na gnas pa'i mi yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-0: las byas pa chung pa dag la ni rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur @194b ba'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la'ang ci 'os ci rigs su shas kyis sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-1: yul de na gnas pa bsod nams med cing brtson 'grus chung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-4: dran pa nyams pa; snying rje'i sems med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-6: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-8: sdig pa mang po byed pa de dag la ni rgyal po chen pos ci rigs ci 'os su chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gcod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-9: kha cig la ni tshig na bas spyos zhing brgyad pa dag byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-10: kha cig la ni rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-11: nor rdzas la sogs pa 'phrog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-12: kha cig la ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag kyang 'phrog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-13: kha cig la ni lcag gis gzhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-15: kha cig la ni yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-17: kha cig la ni mgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-19: de dag la sogs pa chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chad pa gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-21: de ltar rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i 'khor lo gsum po 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-22: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pas phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:194b-23: grogs po ngan pa btul cing lus srung ba'i nan tan mkhas pas tshe'ang ring par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang dbang po la shin tu mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor @195a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-4: shes rab las ring du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-7: zhi ba yongs su spangs te dran pa nyams nas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dag nga gang na ba der 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-8: nga la skyabs su 'ongs nas de dag gi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-11: mos pa shin tu mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-12: cis 'dul ba bzhin du chad pas gcad pa'i thabs 'dul ba la sogs pa'i chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-13: sems can gang nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-14: bslab pa mang po gzungs su mi 'dzin pa dag la ni ngas bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dngos po 'di dag byed du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-15: la lar ni dran par bya ba'i dam bca' bas chad pas gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-16: la lar ni tshig na bas bsdigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-19: la lar ni skad cig dgar zhing smra dbab pas gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-20: la lar ni phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-22: rnyed pa lhan cig tu mi spyod pas gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-23: la lar ni rtsa dgram pa lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-24: la lar ni bskrad pa la sogs pa'i chad pas gcad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-25: de ltar gang zag de dag gi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195a-28: mos pa kun mkhyen pas ci rigs ci 'os su chad pas gcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-0: de'ang don med pa'i mun pa'i tshogs bsags @195b pa gzhom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-1: nyon mongs pa'i chu bo bskam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-2: mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba thob pa'i phyir mi dge ba spyod pa'i gang zag 'dul ba'i phyir ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-3: ci rigs su chad pas gcad pa'i chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-4: mdo sde mang po las kyang mi dge ba spyod pa chad pas gcad pa'i chos ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-6: de'i chos rgya cher bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-7: ngas mchog dam pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-9: mos pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'ang shin tu mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-10: cis 'dul ba bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-11: bslab cing goms su bcug pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs shing 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer chen por btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-13: nga ni de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'khor lo gsum po 'di dang ldan te 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-19: myong ba'i chos kun mkhyen pas ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:195b-20: bde pa'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-0: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su dam bca' zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas lha @196a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-2: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-5: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po ni bdag gi yul na gang zag ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-6: mu stegs can rnam pa sna tshogs la skyabs su song zhing log pa la dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-8: log pa la slong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-9: log pa'i brtul zhugs la mngon par zhen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-10: log pa'i ltas bzang ngan la chags nas don med pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag rgyal po chen po des shes nas rtag tu yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-11: yang bsdus te rgyal po snga ma'i dam pa'i chos lugs kyis rgyas par bstan nas log par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-12: log par dad pa spong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-13: rgyal po snga ma'i chos lugs bslab pa la nan tan du spyod cig par bkas btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-14: yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'jug pa gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-17: 'dod pa gcig par thams cad mthun par rgyal po snga ma'i dam pa'i chos bzhin du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196a-18: bka' bzhin du nyan cing rjes su spyod pas de na gnas pa thams cad mthun par gang bya bar rigs pa rnams byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-0: rgyal @196b rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po'ang rtag tu blon po rnams dang 'dus nas ston mo byed cing longs spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-1: dga' bas rol cing gshegs pas gros mthun pas rgyal po'i las byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-3: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de ltar rgyal po'i 'khor lo bzhi po 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-4: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-5: phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-6: grogs po ngan pa btul zhing lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-8: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i mos pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'jig rten na log pa la phyogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-11: log pa'i chos la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-12: log pa'i las spyod pa de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bar de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing gzigs nas rtag tu yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-13: yang 'khor mang po bsdus te snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bsab pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:196b-17: sdom pa gsum la sogs pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-1: par phye ste mngon par bstan nas 'khor mang po rnams rnam par grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-2: phyin ci log tu lta ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-3: dge ba bcu'i yang dag pa'i las kyi lam la rnam par 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-4: sems can rnams ni rtag tu mthun par chos la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-5: chos la spyod par thabs kyis drang zhing sgom du 'dzud pas rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-6: 'bras bu rgyun mi 'chad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-7: sems can rnams 'khor rnam bzhi dang mthun par dge pa spyod pa'i khyad par la nan tan byed du bcug nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-9: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-10: lam gyi yan lag la spro bzhin du rtse'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-11: 'phags pa'i bstan pa yun du gnas par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-12: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-16: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-17: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-18: de ma yin pa ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-19: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-20: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs la ci dgar rtser bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-22: nga ni de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bzhi pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197a-23: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis so so'i skye bo ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-1: ci la dga' ba kun mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-2: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-3: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-4: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-5: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te 'khor mang po'i nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-8: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po bdag gi yul na gnas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-9: pha rol gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa'i sems can tshad med pa snyed pa dag gi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-10: gzugs la chags shing skyo mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-11: pha rol po gzhan gyi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-12: gzugs la chags shing 'dod pas de bsrung ba'i phyir grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-15: rgyal po'i pho brang yang mkhar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-16: ra bas bskor ba nas bya shal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-17: ne tso'i bar du srung du 'dzud de stor cing gong bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-19: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po 'di ltar rgyal po'i 'khor lo lnga pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-20: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-21: phas rgol [?] ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:197b-22: grogs po ngan pa btul cing lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-1: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang rang bzhin la shin tu thabs mkhas pas mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas bdud sdig can ma rungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-2: mu stegs can dgu bcu rtsa lnga po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-3: de ma yin pa gzhan yang bdud kyi ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-4: mu stegs can tshad med pa snyed kyis bslus pa kun mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-5: sems can gang bdag gi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-6: gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-7: pha rol po gzhan gyi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-8: gzugs la'ang chags shing 'dod pas tshol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-10: nga'i 'khor rnams la phrag dog bskyed de; nga bsad pa'i phyir bsod snyoms kyi nang du dug bcug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-11: me dong gi steng du gdan bting ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-13: bal glang smyos pa rbad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-14: ral gri phyung ste snyegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-17: mi tshangs par spyod do zhes skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-18: ma ning yin no zhes btags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-19: mi ma yin pa'o zhes brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-20: sgyu ma'o zhes tshig ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang nga la smod cing skur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-21: nga'i nyan thos kyi slob ma la'ang phrag dog bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-22: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis skur cing smod pa rnam pa mang po byed par mkhyen nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po drug bsrung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198a-24: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-0: so so yang dag par @198b rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-1: nyan thos rnams la'ang chos kyi mdo rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su dag pa rnam par bzhag pa bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin kun yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-4: de ltar sems can gyi rang bzhin tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun mkhyen nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-6: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-8: ngas de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo lnga pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-9: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gyi rang bzhin tshad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun so sor mkhyen pas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-11: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-12: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-13: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-14: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra rab tu sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:198b-17: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar grong khyer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-0: rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par bsrung ba'i phyir 'obs kyis bskor ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sha ri dang @199a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-1: ne tso'i bar du srung ma btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-4: bu mor bcas pas yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa lnga la rtse zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la bag med par dbang po drug nyams rangs su spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-6: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de de ltar rgyal po'i 'khor lo drug pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-7: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-9: grogs po ngan pa thams cad btul te lus srung ba'i nan tan la mkhas pas tshe'ang ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-11: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang; nyan thos chen po rnams kyang thams cad 'phags pas bstan pa'i grong khyer brtan par btsud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-12: de'i 'og tu bsam gtan mchog dam pa la snyoms par 'jug pa nas bsam gtan bzhi'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-13: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199a-14: de bzhin du rgyas par 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-0: de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du @199b snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-1: ting nge 'dzin de dag tu zhugs nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-12: lus srul po la sogs pa sems can la gnod cing 'tshe ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-15: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa bye ba brgya stong snyed ngas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-16: thams cad la shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-17: bsam pa yongs su dag pas dkon mchog gsum la mchog dam pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-18: dad pa bskyed nas bsti stang dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-19: bkur sti dang bcas te ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags te yongs su bcad par dam bca'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-20: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis skad cig yud tsam gyis tshad med dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-22: chos kyi sgrib pa kun byang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-23: tshad med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-24: ye shes kyi tshogs kun yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-25: 'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas shing mya ngan las 'da' ba la phyogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:199b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos srung zhing 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-2: nga'ang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo drug pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-3: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-4: ting nge 'dzin dang; rnam par grol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-6: mnyam par gzhag pa tshad med pa brgya stong snyed la rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-7: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa tshad med pa snyed bsal nas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-8: cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-9: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar 'god do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-10: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su dam bca' zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-11: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so zhes gsung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-14: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po ni blon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200a-15: dmag rnam bzhi dang bcas te bdag gi ris su dbang pa'i grong khyer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-0: nags tshal la sogs par kun tu byung zhing brtags @200b nas yul de phyogs kyi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-1: the tshom du bcas pa'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-2: g-yang zab bsdur mi rung ba'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-3: pha rol gyi dgra 'khras shing 'tshe ba'i gnas rnams su rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen pos rang gi nyams kyis dpags shing rnam pa thams cad du sbyangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-4: bde bar 'jog pa la sbyor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-5: legs par bsrung zhing brtan par byas pas gnas pa'i phyogs de dag mnyam pa las byar rung ba phas kyi dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-6: grogs po ngan pa glags lta zhing 'khras pa'i gnas med par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-8: bag tsha ba bsal ba'i phyir yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral zhing rab tu bde zhing skyid par skyabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-10: de ltar rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i 'khor lo bdun pa de dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-11: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bdag gi yul rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-15: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:200b-17: gti mug gi bsam pa gang dang ldan pa rab tu mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-0: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin @201a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-1: du nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nang mi mthun pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mkhyen pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-3: thabs mkhas pa'i shugs kyis ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub pa'i sman dam pa byin pas sems can dag nyon mongs pa'i nad bal ba la nan tan dang brtson 'grus byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-4: sems can gang mi gtsang ba la rtog pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-5: de la mi gtsang ba la rtog pa'i sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-6: sems can gang tshangs pa'i gnas la nan tan byas pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na tshangs pa'i gnas kyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-7: sems can gang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad sel bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-8: de la rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-9: sems can gang dbugs bgrang ba yid la byas pas nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-10: de la dbugs bgrang pa yid la bya ba'i sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-11: sems can gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201a-12: de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-0: sems can gang bsam @201b gtan bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-1: de la bsam gtan gyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-2: sems can gang gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-3: de la gzugs med pa'i bsam gtan sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-4: sems can gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar 'os pa zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-5: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sman sgom du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-6: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dag la de lta bu'i chos kyi sman gyis sbyin pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-7: snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad bdud rnam bzhi'i dbang du 'gyur bar mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-8: snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-9: mi'i theg pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing ngan song du gzhol bar mi mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-11: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du med par 'gyur bar mi mdzad de; de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la de lta bu'i chos kyi sman gyi sbyin pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:201b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bdun pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-0: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis bla na med pa kun tu 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi sman rnam pa sna tshogs byin pa de sgom du btsud @202a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-1: na nyon mongs pa'i nad kun zhi zhing 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-4: 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-10: gzhon nu'i tshe rtse ba la sogs pa thams cad la dran pa mngon par bzhag ces sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-12: gnas gang du thog ma btsas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-14: bang du blangs shing nu zho snun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-15: lus dang; yan lag gi tshogs mnyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-16: dga' bzhin du rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-18: bye ma la rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-19: 'khor dang bcas te bag med pa rnam pa mang pos rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-21: de ma yin pa'i las rnam pa gzhan byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-22: rgyal po gzhan gyi yul du rgyu zhing 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-23: rgyal po'i bya ba sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-24: rgyal po'i las byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-25: rgyal tsha ba byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-26: rgyal thabs thob nas dbang du gyur te bde ba'i longs spyod chen po myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202a-27: grags pa chen pos phyogs kun tu grags pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-1: bdag gi srid 'dzin cing pha rol mi 'tsho'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-8: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa; yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa'i tshe bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-9: pha rol po gzhan gyi sngon gyi skye ba tshad med pa snyed na ci byas pa'i dngos po kun dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-13: skye ba gsum nas skye ba tshad med pa brgya stong gi bar gyi ci byas pa'i dngos po kun dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-14: de bzhin du bskal pa 'grub pa dgongs pa nas bskal pa 'jig pa'ang dgongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-15: bskal pa chad med pa 'grub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-16: bskal pa tshad med pa 'jig pa'i bar du thams cad dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-17: 'di ni sngon 'das pa'i dus na che ge mo zhig na 'dug 'dug ste rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:202b-22: sdug bsngal yang 'di dag myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:203a-2: tshe'i mthar thug pa na che ge mo zhig tu tshe 'phos nas 'di dag tu skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:203a-3: 'di dag tu tshe 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes pa la sogs pa dngos po tshad dpag tu med pa kun dgongs pas sems can gyi dbang po so so ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:203a-7: nga de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa 'di dang ldan te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:203a-23: sems can gang su'i khyim du skyes na rtul phod cing dpa' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:205b-16: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:205b-17: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:205b-18: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par lta ba thams cad btul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:205b-19: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:205b-22: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po ni gling bzhi pa'i sems can tshad med pa'i lus kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs bsal pa'i phyir rgyal thabs btang nas spos chus lus bkrus nas gos gtsang ma sar ba gyon nas lus drang por bsrang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-3: mnyam pa'i sems yid la byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-4: nad thams cad las thar par bya ba'i phyir me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-6: rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-7: de ma yin pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang pos mthu tshe ba gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i lha thams cad la mchod pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-8: de'i tshe na lha'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-9: klu'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar du thams cad kyis de ltar shes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad ces zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-10: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po 'di yon tan dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-11: gzi brjid che bas na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-12: bdag cag gis der dong la gling bzhi la dbang ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-13: sems can rnams nad med cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-14: lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar du thams cad lhags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-15: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-16: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-17: gling bzhi la dbang byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-18: bu stong dang ldan te thams cad dpa' brtul phod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206a-19: mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-0: phas rgol ba'i dgra thul ba @206b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-1: dbang bar gyur pa'i sa chen po de ltar rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas pho brang du thug gi bar du mtshon cha mi spyod cing thams cad dam pa'i chos spyod de bde skyid par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-3: rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po de ltar 'khor lo bcu pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-4: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis gling chen po bzhi nas phyogs mtshams brgyad dang; gling phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-5: bdag gi lus shin tu srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-7: tshe 'phos nas kyang mtho ris kyi lhar skye zhing longs spyod dam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-9: de ltar de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i tshe na bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-10: gzhan gyi lus la nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam pa tshad med pa snyed yod par mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin gyi spos chus ni lus bkrus bden pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-12: snying rje chen po'i chus khrus byas pa khrel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-13: 'dzem pa'i gos gyon nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-19: thugs rjes rjes su bzung ste thams cad kyis gsung mthun par /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:206b-21: skyes bu chen po 'di ni bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-1: shes chen po'i tshogs kyis yongs su brgyan pa'i snod du gyur pas rnam par thar pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi snod du gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-5: bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa'i gnas byams pa chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-6: snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-7: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-8: bde ba'i don byed pa la spro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-9: sangs rgyas rin po che tshol ba'i tshong dpon du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-10: 'khor bas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su sgrol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-11: sems can la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba chen po rab tu stobs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-12: bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bden pa'i gsung gis ci dang; ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos thob nas chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-14: nga de'i tshe na bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207a-15: ye shes kyi tshogs la brten te shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-0: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi la dbang sgyur ba bzhin du de bzhin @207b gshegs pa yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-1: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-3: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-9: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnam pa bdun dang ldan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-11: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong dang ldan te thams cad dpa' zhing brtul phod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-12: mdzes shing yid du 'ong bas pha rol po'i dgra thams cad thul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang dang por 'phags pa cang shes koondi n+ya nas tha mar tshe dang ldan pa rab tu bzang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-13: rab des la sogs pa nyan thos kyi 'khor chen po sangs rgyas kyi thugs las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-15: bstan pa'i chos las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-17: zag pa yongs su zad pa'i phyir dpa' la rtsal che ba zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-18: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ldan pas mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:207b-20: mu stegs can thul bas phas rgol ba'i dgra thul ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-0: ji ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po @208a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-1: gling phran brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul zhing ston pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang dzambu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-3: nub kyi ba glang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang; shar gyi lus 'phags bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-4: byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-5: rgya mtsho chen po bye ba brag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-6: ri rab lhun po bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-7: rgyal chen ris bzhi bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-8: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-9: khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rgya che ba gcig tu gyur par gsung gis dbang sgyur ba la mnga' brnyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-11: nga 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bcu pa 'di dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-12: 'khor lo de'i dbang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdag dang gzhan gyi lus kyi zag pa thams cad yongs su zad pa mkhyen nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-13: sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-14: bde ba'i don gyis 'jigs pa med pa la bde bar bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-15: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-16: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-17: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-18: 'khor mang po'i nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208a-20: nga ni de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bcu pa 'di dag dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-0: sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi @208b zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos rnams nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-1: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyis brel ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-2: mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-4: chad pa'i dra bas kun glags shing zil gyis non pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-5: ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba skyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-6: phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyis mi 'jigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-7: rtag tu kun nas khebs pa'i ma rig pa'i mun par gnas pa la dad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-8: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-9: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-10: dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa la dbang za ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-11: dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-12: mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa 'dir bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-13: nga ni sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan pas 'jigs pa med par bde bar gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-14: 'jigs pa med pas nga ni drang srong chen po'i gnas su bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-15: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-16: bdud du bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-17: sems can thams cad kyi rigs la rdo rje ltar sra ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom nas ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-18: cis 'dul ba bzhin du snod du gyur ba'i sems can thams cad theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par rnam par bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:208b-19: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas 'dul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-6: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i bar du 'khor mang po thams cad rab tu dga' nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-7: skad mthun par legs so zhes smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-8: spos kyi char chen po rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-9: me tog gi char chen po'ang rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-10: rin po che'i char chen po'ang rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-11: na bza'i char chen po'ang rab tu phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-12: brgya stong sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-13: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-14: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa snyed kyis gzungs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-20: sems can tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-22: sems can tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209a-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las 'khor lo bcu'i le'u ste gnyis so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-1: de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po zhes bya ba dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-5: shes rab rgya mtsho yon tan mdzod can la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-6: bdag gis the tshom zhu zhing gsol bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-7: shes rab rgya mtsho thugs rjes skabs phye ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-8: bdag gi rtog pa'i the tshom bsal bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-9: bdag cag skom gyis shin tu gdungs pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-10: yon tan snying po mchog gi chos ro dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-11: phul du gyur pa don dam chos kyi ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-12: 'khor du gyur pa thams cad thos par smon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-14: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-17: de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-18: tshangs pa chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-20: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas tshigs su bcad de zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-21: shes rab ldan zhing ting 'dzin rab bsgoms te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-22: bdag med pa la bde bar gnas pa'i rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-23: 'on te dam pa'i don la gnas bgyi'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:209b-24: 'on te 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gnas par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-2: 'don cing goms par bgyid de rtsol ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-3: 'on te nyon mongs mtsho las rgal bgyi'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-4: 'on ta ma ngan song dag tu ltung bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-5: bsod nams byed la shin tu 'bad rtsol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-6: nges par mya ngan 'da' la gzhol 'gyur ram //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-8: 'on te ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-9: shes rab ldan pa'i rgyal thabs dbang bskur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-10: 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-12: 'on te sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-13: kun nas nyon mongs pas ni glags pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-14: nyon mongs mang pos 'khrul bar gyur pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-15: ji ltar sems ni yongs su dag par sbyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-16: sgom dang 'don pa'i las dag ji ltar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-19: don de dag legs par zhu bar spobs ba legs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-20: khyod ni chos 'di dag la shin tu nan tan byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-21: khyod ni spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-22: khyod ni sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed la sgo gsum yongs su sbyang ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-24: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tshob pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210a-25: de'ang sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210b-0: bde ba'i @210b don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don zab mo 'di dag dris pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210b-3: shes pa brda sprod pa chen po gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210b-4: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210b-5: sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210b-6: 'khor ba las skyo bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:210b-8: nyon mongs pa yongs su bcad pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-8: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos 'di la gnas par bya ba 'di la bstan par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-9: de bas na skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-11: de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-15: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-16: gal te rnal 'byor can dag spyod pa ngan pa 'di las 'ga' tsam gyi rjes su zhugs na'ang 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tsam yang yongs su mi 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-17: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma thag tu phyir stor cing nyams par gyur na gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211a-18: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin nas theg pa gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-0: theg pa gcig gi bar du thob par 'gyur ba @211b lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-3: 'jig rten na kha cig ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel pas tshol ba'i rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-4: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang tshul khrims nyams shing kha na ma thob mang po byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-5: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang phyin ci log tu lta zhing 'jig rten gyi ltas bzang ngan la chags te lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-7: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang sems g-yo zhing rgod pas 'phags pa la ma gzhol te dbang po rgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-8: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang phra ma byed pa la dga' bas dbyen byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-9: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang ngag rtsub pos 'phags pa la smod cing dbang za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-10: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang tshig kyal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-12: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-13: phrag dog gis gzhan gyi khe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-15: rnyed pa la mi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-16: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pas sems can la gnod sems skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-17: kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin sgom 'dod kyang log par lta ba dang bcas pas rgyu dang 'bras bu med par lta ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-19: de ltar shes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:211b-21: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-0: gal te ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag spyod pa ngan pa 'di @212a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-1: dag las 'ga' tsam gyi rjes su zhugs na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba'ang yongs su mi 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-2: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma theg tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur na gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-3: gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-5: gcig thob par 'gyur pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-9: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu yod do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-10: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag spyod pa ngan pa 'di dag las 'ga' zhig dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin yongs su mi 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-11: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma thag tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-14: las su bya ba'i dngos po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-15: bre mo'i gtam la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-16: gnyid kyis log pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-17: zang zing tshol ba la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-18: gzugs bzang po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-19: sgra snyan pa la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-20: dri zhim po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-21: ro zhim po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-22: reg bya 'jam po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212a-24: dpyod pa la dga' zhing chags pa'o; ;tshangs pa chen po /
