K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-0: spyad par mi bya ba'i chos rnam pa bcu po de ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag spyod pa ngan pa 'di las 'ga' zhig dang ldan @212b na'ang ting nge 'dzin dag yongs su mi 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-1: ji ste sngar grub na'ang de ma thag tu stor cing nyams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-2: gal te ting nge 'dzin ma bsgrubs na dge ba'i tshogs gzhan ci bsags kyang de ni don du mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-3: gang bdag gi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-4: dad pas sbyin pa bsgrub pa'i phyir sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-5: sems las byung ba'i chos ngan pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-6: de'i rkyen gyis rgyal po dang; blon po chen po'i khrims dang yang 'gal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-7: kha cig la ni gshe shing spyod ba'ang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-8: kha cig la ni lcag gis gzhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-9: kha cig la ni lus kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-10: nying lag gcod cing gcod par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-11: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis nad drag pos 'debs shing yun ring por sdug bsngal myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-13: 'chi 'phos nas kyang ngan song gsum gang yang rung ba gcig gi nang du skye ba nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-16: de shu ku ba la ki dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-17: lhas byin la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bsam gtan las nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-18: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung zhing rnam pa tshad med pa snyed kyi sdug bsngal chen po mi bzod pa kun myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:212b-19: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa cang shes koondi n+ya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-0: bas mthar gnas shing ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i dge slong @213a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-1: dag gnas khang mchog dag na gnas shing mal cha mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-2: kha zas mchog la spyod cing dge 'dun gyi las thams cad mi byed par gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-4: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag gal te 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis brel bar gyur na sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-5: sems las byung ba'i chos ngan pa skye zhing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi 'grub pa nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung zhing mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po rnam pa tshad med pa snyed myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-6: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag gal te 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin mang po ma grub pa'ang grub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-7: sngar grub pa dag kyang mi nyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-8: de'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i chos thams cad mi skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par mi dge ba'i rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-9: dpyod pa'i bar du mi skye ba la mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-10: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dag gal te ting nge 'dzin mang po ma grub na nam gyi stod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-11: nam gyi smad la mi nyal bar byas te brtson 'grus su bslab cing bsgom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-12: 'du 'dzi yongs su spangs te 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213a-13: ci la'ang mi chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-5: bag med pa thams cad yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-6: gang de ltar nan tan byed pa de ni brgya byin dang; tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs pas bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-13: bsnyen bkur la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-14: sbyin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyang blang bar bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-17: rje'u rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa len pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-18: ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa dag kyang de dag gi bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-25: mchod pa bdag gir byed du dbang na ting nge 'dzin thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-27: ting 'dzin bsgoms pas the tshom gcod 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-28: de ma gtogs par gzhan gyis nus ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-29: de bas ting 'dzin bsgom pa mchog yin gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-30: mkhas pa dag gis de la mchod pa bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-31: de nas tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-33: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag gal te rgyal rigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:213b-36: dbyug pa la sogs pas gzhus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-1: sam; gal te btson rar bcug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-5: srog dang phral te bkum na de ci rigs pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-9: sems can gang zhig nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-11: ngur smrig gi tshal bu gyon na tshul khrims srung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-13: tshul khrims med kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-16: lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang khyim pa'i chos nyid dang sbyar du'ang mi gnang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-18: dbyig pa la sogs pas lus la gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-22: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-23: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-24: chos ma yin pa dang sbyor ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-26: tshul khrims srung zhing mang du thos pa dang ldan pa lta zhog la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-27: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims nyams te mi dge ba'i chos spyod pas nang rul cing mi gtsang bas gang ba'i srin kva lva dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-28: dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-29: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214a-30: nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs las pham pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-1: khas bub pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong ngan pa'ang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-10: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-12: yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa'i gter du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-14: rigs kyi bu; nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims nyams kyang sems can dag gzugs mthong ba tsam gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam pa bcu skye bas na yon tan rin po che'i phung po dpag tu med pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-17: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims nyams mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-18: sems can dag gis mthong bar gyur na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas bkur sti dang bcas pas dang cing gus pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-19: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mu stegs can gyi ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-21: de'i 'khor la nam du'ang mi phyogs pa nas 'jigs pa dang bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-22: la las mthong nas 'phags pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-23: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:214b-24: ma byin par len pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-1: g-yem pa yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-2: brdzun du smra ba yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-3: bag med pa'i gnas smyo ba'i khu ba chang la sogs pa 'thung ba yongs su spong ba nas 'jigs pa dang bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-4: la las mthong nas sbyin pa rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-5: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyi longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing yang dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-6: yang dag pa'i spyod pa can la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-7: bsnyen bkur byed pa nas 'jigs pa dang bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-8: la las mthong nas ngang des pa'i bzod pa rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-9: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis phra ma yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-12: zhe sdang yongs su spong ba nas 'jigs pa dang bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215a-13: la las mthong nas rab tu 'byung zhing brtson 'grus la nan tan bya bar rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-0: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis khyim rab tu spong zhing khyim ma yin pa'i chos len te shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis spyod pa'i mchog nan tan byed pa nas 'jigs pa med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen @215b po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-1: la las mthong nas 'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spong zhing bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-2: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-4: bas mtha' dgon pa la mos shing nyin mtshan du ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa la brtson 'grus rtsom pa nas 'jigs pa med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-5: la las mthong nas shes rab rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-7: klog pa dang; 'don pa la dga' zhing spro ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-8: la las mthong nas yang dag par 'byung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed par rjes su dran pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa skye ba nas 'dzum bzhin du smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-9: spro bzhin du gtam zer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-10: [?] rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i bar du byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-11: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rigs che zhing mtho pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-12: btsun pa'i rigs su skye zhing sems can tshad med pa kun gyis mthong na dga' ba nas 'jigs pa dang bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen po la 'jug pa'i bar du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:215b-14: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims nyams kyang sems can dag gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-0: cha lugs mthong ba tsam gyis lhag @216a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-1: pa'i bsam pa rnam pa 'di bcu skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-2: yon tan rin po che'i phung po tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-3: de bas na rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-5: dbang po la sogs pas de la lcag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-6: dbyig pa la sogs pas gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-9: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-10: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba la sogs pa bya bar mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-13: nga la skyabs su song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-14: rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims nyams te mi dge ba'i chos spyod pa nang rul cing mi gtsang bas gang ba'i srin kva lva dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-15: dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-16: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod pa khas 'che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-17: nyon mongs pa rnam pa mang po las pham pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-19: khas bub pa lta bu'i dge slong tshul khrims nyams te mi dge ba spyod med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-25: nam mkha' lding dang; mi'am ci dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-27: mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-28: 'dren pa'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen byed cing yon tan dpag tu med pa'i gter du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-29: de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-31: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon nas cha lugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216a-32: spyod lam 'phags pa rnams dang mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-0: @216b de mthong ba tsam gyis sems can tshad med pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-2: sems can tshad med pa rnams mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-3: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i yang dag pa'i lam la 'dzud par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-4: de bas na nga la skyabs su song ste rab tu byung ba dag tshul khrims srung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-6: tshul khrims med kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-9: blon po la sogs pas khyim pa'i chos nyid dang sbyor du'ang ma gnang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-11: dbyig pa la sogs pas gzhu ba dang; 'tshog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-15: nying lag gcod cing gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-16: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba la sogs pa chos ma yin pa gzhan lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-18: de ltar tshul khrims nyams shing sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ngas bstan pa'i 'dul ba las mi ro lta bu'o zhes gsungs mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-21: yon tan lhag ma'i mthu yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-24: gla ba lta bu shi ste rnam par shes pa dang bral nas byol song gi nang na ro yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-25: khyu mchog la gi wang yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:216b-26: gla ba la gla rtsi yod pas sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa'i phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-0: bde ba'i don chen por 'gyur ba bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge @217a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-1: slong de'ang ngas bstan pa'i 'dul ba las mi ro lta bu'o zhes bya mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-4: yon tan lhag ma'i mthus kyang sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-5: bde ba'i don chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-8: tshong pa dag kyang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas rigs gcig pa'i sems can tshad med pa dag bsad de mig phyung nas mig gi 'bras bu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-9: brtan zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu dang lhan cig sbyar na mig sman rin po cher 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-10: sems can gang long ba mig med pa mngal nas phyung nas dmus long du gyur pa dag gi mig tu rin po che'i mig sman des byugs na mig nad thams cad dang bral te mig rno zhing gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-11: de bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong yang ngas bstan pa'i 'dul ba las mi ro lta bu zhes bya mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-12: rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-13: cha lugs yod pas sems can [?] tshad med pa dag gis skad cig mthong ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par dag pa'i shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur na pha rol po gzhan la dam pa'i chos ston nus pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-14: tshangs pa chen po 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217a-15: bdug spos bsregs na spos nyid tshig ste med par song yang dri bsung gis gzhan la bro bar byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-0: de bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong de'ang tshul khrims nyams @217b pas bsod nams kyi zhing gshin pa ma yin te nyin mtshan du dad pas byin pas bsregs te tshe 'phos nas ngan song gsum du lhung mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-1: sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa'i phan pa dang; bde ba'i don du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-2: mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-3: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bsung tshor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-6: de ltar tshul khrims nyams shing sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong la khyim pa thams cad kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-8: rab tu byung ba de la lcag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-9: dbyug pas gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-12: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-13: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang 'bral du ngas ma gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-14: de dag yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du gso sbyin bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-16: tshul nas byung ba'i tshe bskrad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-17: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-21: 'tsho ba'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad la spyod du mi dbang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-22: dge sbyong gis 'dul ba'i las byed pa thams cad kyi nang du 'ong du mi gnang bar zad kyi de la gzhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-25: srog gi dbang po la sogs pa dang dbral bar ni ma gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-27: tsampa ka yi me tog rnyis gyur kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:217b-28: me tog rnam pa gzhan pas shin tu lhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-1: slong tshul khrims nyams shing sdig spyod kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-2: mu stegs can dag thams cad kun pas mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-5: mtshams med pa'i khan ma thob chen po'i las rnam pa lnga yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-7: ched du bsams te pha bsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-8: ched du bsams te ma bsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-9: ched du bsams te dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-10: log par lta bas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-11: ngan sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku la khrag phyung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-12: rnam pa 'di lnga ni mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-13: gang zag gang zhig rnam pa 'di lnga las gcig tsam byas na rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs su mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-14: gal te rab tu phyung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-15: bsnyen par rdzogs pa byin na de'i slob dpon de nyes pa dang bcas pa yin pas dge 'dun gyi dang nas bskrad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-16: de ltar gang zag de rab tu byung nas spyod lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-17: cha lugs yod pa'i phyir de la'ang lcags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-18: dbyig pas gzhu zhing 'tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-21: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-22: srog gi dbang po dang dbral du mi gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-24: mtshams med pa'i kha na mtho ba chen po'i las dang nye ba rnam pa bzhi yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218a-26: mi dge ba'i sems kyis rang sangs rgyas bsad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-0: de'ang srog gcod pa'i nang na @218b kha na mtho ba chen po'i las yin te nyes pa'i rtsa ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-1: dgra bcom pa'i dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-2: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i nang na kha nam tho ba chen po'i las yin pas nyes pa'i rtsa ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-3: dad pas byin pa'i dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor nor la spyod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-4: ma byin par len pa'i na ngan kha na mtho bo'i las yin pos nyes pa'i rtsa ba yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-5: ngan par lta bas 'dum pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-6: brdzun du smra ba'i nang na khan mthob chen po'i las yin pas nyes pa'i rtsa ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-7: gang zag gang zhig mtshams med pa'i khan ma thob chen po'i las dang nye ba rnam pa bzhi po 'di las gcig tsam byas na rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs su mi gnang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-8: gal te rab tu byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-9: bsnyen par rdzogs pa byin na de'i slob dpon nyes pa dang bsam pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-10: nga'i bstan pa las bskrad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-11: de ltar gang zag de rab tu byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-12: bsnyen par rdzogs na spyod lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-13: cha lugs dang ldan pas de la'ang lcags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-14: dbyig pas gzhu zhing 'tshog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-18: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-19: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang bral ba'i bar du byed du mi gnang ngo; ;de ltar la la ni rtsa ba'i sdig pa yin la mtshams med pa ma yin pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:218b-20: la la ni mtshams med pa yin la rtsa ba'i sdig pa ma yin pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-0: la la ni rtsa ba'i sdig kyang yin @219a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-1: la mtshams med pa'i sdig kyang yin pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-2: la la ni rtsa ba'i sdig kyang ma yin la mtshams med pa'ang ma yin pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-3: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba'i sdig kyang yin la mtshams med pa'ang yin pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-5: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa la ched du bsams te bden pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gang zag bsad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-6: 'di ni rtsa ba'i sdig kyang yin la mtshams med pa'ang yin bsangs bstan pa'i 'dul ba'i chos las myur du bskrad dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-7: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba'i sdig ni yin la mchams med pa ma yin pa zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-9: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa las ched du bsams te gang zag pha rol po gzhan gyi srog bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-10: chung du na dug byin pas mngal na 'dug pa bsad bste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-11: de dag ni rtsa ba'i sdig yin la mtshams med pa ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-12: gang zag de dge 'dun dang zhag tu lhan cig tu gnas shing longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-13: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod du mi gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-14: de la ji ltar na mtshams med pa ni yin la rtsa ba'i sdig ma yin pa zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-16: gang zag gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219a-18: khrims bcu 'dzin ba dag mtshams med pa lnga las gcig tsam byas pa dag ni mtshams med pa'i sdig yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-0: rtsa ba'i @219b sdeg ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-1: gang zag de ni rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs su mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-2: gal te rab tu byung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-3: bsnyan par rdzogs pa byin na 'di'i slob dpon sdig pa dang bcas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-4: nga'i bstan pa las bskrad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-5: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba'i sdig kyang ma yin la mtshams med pa'ang ma yin pa zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-7: gang zag gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-8: khrims lnga bcung ba las sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-10: dge 'dun la the tshom za ba'i sems skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-11: mu stegs can la skyabs su song nas ston pa'i slob dpon du 'dzin tam; ltas su blta ba sna tshogs la ltas su 'dzin cing 'jig rten gyi lhar rjed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-12: gang zag gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-14: theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la skur cing sgro 'dogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-17: bdag yid mi shes shing yid dpas pha rol po gzhan dag kyang de las zlog cing bar chad byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-20: glegs bam du 'dri ba'i tshigs bcad gcig tsam gyi yang bar du gcod cing bgegs byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:219b-21: de ni rtsa ba'i sdig kyang ma yin la mtshams med pa'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-0: kha nam thob che po'i las mtshams med pa dang nye ba @220a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-2: gang zag de kha na mtho ba'i sdig pa'i las chen po dag mthol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-3: bshags pa ma byas kyi bar du rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-4: bsnyen par rdzogs su mi rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-5: la la zhig gis rab tu phyung nga /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-6: bsnyen par rdzogs pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-7: de'i slob dpon de sdig pa dang bcas pa yin pas nga'i bstan pa las bskrad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-8: gang zag de rab tu byung ngam bsnyen par rdzogs nas kha na ma tho ba'i sdig ba de mthol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-9: bshags pa'i las ma byas na de ni ngas bstan pa'i 'dul ba las myur du bsgrad dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-11: gang zag rnam pa de gnyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi mig med par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-12: dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma nub par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-13: dkon mchog gi gdung yongs su gcod pa ste lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-14: mi la sogs pas don med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-15: phan pa med pa'i sdug bsngal spyod du 'dzug cing ngan song du ltung bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-16: gang zag rnam pa gnyis po de ni bdag nyid kyi dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa rnam la smon pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-17: pha rol po gzhan dag kyang dam pa'i chos la skur cing 'phags pa rnams la smod du 'dzud pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-18: tshe 'phos ma thag tu mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung zhing bskal ba'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te phyir gsor mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220a-21: bcas pa'i sdig la mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-0: mi bya ba'ang yod @220b la; rang bzhin gyi sdig la mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-2: rang bzhin gyi sdig la rtsa ba'i sdig tu 'gyur ba mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-4: de la ji ltar na rtsa ba'i sdig la mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-5: mi bya ba'i chos gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-7: dge slong gang zhig mi tshangs par spyod pas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa dang ched du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-8: skye bo mi'i srog bcad nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-9: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor ma byin pa brkus nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-10: rdzun chen po smras nas rtsa ba'i sdig byas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-11: dge slong gang zhig rtsa ba'i sdig rnam pa 'di bzhi las 'ga' zhig byas na dge slong gis las bya ba'i nang du mi chud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-13: phyogs bzha'i dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod du mi dbang mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-15: lcag gis brdeg cing gzhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-17: spyi zhing gshe ba dang lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-18: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba la sogs pa thams cad byed du mi gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-19: de dag ni rang bzhin gyi sdig gi nad na rtsa ba'i sdig lce'i ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-22: ci'i phyir de la rtsa ba'i sdig ces bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-23: gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa de bzhin byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-24: tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-25: ngan song du 'gro ba'i rtsa ba yin pas na rtsa ba'i sdig ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:220b-26: de la ci'i phyir mtshams med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-1: med pa la nye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-2: rtsa ba'i sdig pa mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-3: mi bya ba'i kha na mtho ba chen po'i las ngan pa zhes gsungs zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-7: ro nye'i dbu ni steng gi nam mkha' la bor na cung zad kyang mi sdod par de mthag tu phyi yang sa la ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-9: mtshams med pa la nye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-11: dam pa'i chos la skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-12: dkon mchog gsum la the tshom za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-13: gang zag sdig ba na rnam gnyis po'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-14: gang zag gang gi sdig pa rnam pa bcu gcig po de las 'ga' zhig byas na tshe 'phos ma thag tu thogs pa med par mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por gdon mi za bar skye zhing sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-15: de bas na mi gnas pa dang mi bya ba'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i las ngan pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-17: mi bya ba'i kha na mtho ba chen po las ngan pa 'di dag byas pa'i gang zag ni lus 'di nyid la nyon mongs pa zad par byed mi nus su nges re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-18: ting nge 'dzin yang mi'i grub na yang dag pa mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa thob pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221a-19: tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar skye zhing sdug bsngal chen bo myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bsam @221b ba dag pas nga'i bstan pa la dad nas nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-2: theg pa chen po la zhugs te ngas bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par bslab pa'i gnas mang po la shin tu bkur ste dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-3: ri ma gror bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-4: rtsa ba'i sdig pa bzhi bsrung ba la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-5: gang zag de la ni rtag tu lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-7: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rjes su 'brang zhing srung ste de ni lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-8: mi la sogs pa'i mchod pa'ang chud mi za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-9: theg pa gsum gang la spro zhing dga' ba bzhin de ma thag tu mtha'i gnas byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-10: de bas na yang dag pa mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pa dag lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-12: chos rnam pa de bzhi nyams par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-14: so so'i skye bo dag ni rgyu rnam pa 'di gsum gyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la brten pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-17: 'phags pas bstan pa la brten pa'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-18: nga'i nye gnas la brten pa'i rgyu ste gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-19: so so'i skye bo dag rgyu rnam pa 'di gsum la brten te btson 'grus su nan tan byas nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde bar thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:221b-20: gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa de bzhi nyams na nga'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-2: gang zag gang gis chos rnam pa de bzhin nyams na de ni ngas bstan pa'i shin tu zab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-3: rgya che ba'i mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-6: bdag med pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-7: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-8: bde ba'i don du 'gyur bar bstan pa so sor thar ba las 'gal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-9: gal te ngas bstan pa'i so sor thar pa las 'gal na de ni bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-10: ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ldongs shing 'thom par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-11: gzhol zhing 'jug mi nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-12: nyon mongs pa mang pos dkris shing glags te theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi snod kyang ma yin pas ngan song du ltung zhing sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-14: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis ngas bstan pa'i so so'i thar pa las rtsa ba bzhi ma nyams te yongs su dag na nga'ang de'i ston pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-15: de'ang nga'i nyan thos yin pas nga'i gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-16: nga'i chos la bde bar gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-17: bya ba thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa yin pas gang zag de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la shin tu gnas pas na dge ba'i chos thams cad la legs par gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-18: nyan thos kyi theg pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa phun sum tshogs phal gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222a-20: theg pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-0: gal te rang bzhin @222b gyi sdig pa'i rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi po de bsrungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-1: de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-2: zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu mchog dam pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-3: de bas na chos rnam pa 'di bzhi srung ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-5: sa chen po la brten nas rtsi shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-8: nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-9: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po 'di srung ba la brten nas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-11: sa chen po la brten nas ri thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-13: ri khong yug chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-14: ri rab ri'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad bde bar gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-15: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po srung ba la brten nas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-17: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-19: sa chen po la brten nas 'jig rten gyi ro bro ba'i mchog thams cad btsal gyis rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-20: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po srung ba la brten nas dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-23: dang des pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:222b-27: sa chen po ni gtsang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-0: mi gtsang ba thams cad snyoms par 'dzin @223a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-1: to; ;tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-2: rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang de bzhin du chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-3: chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa la sems mnyam par bzhag ste de la mi brnyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-7: co mi 'dri na dge ba'i chos thams cad skye ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-9: sa chen po 'di la ni sems can thams cad de la longs spyod cing bde bar 'tsho'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-10: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-11: rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yang dag pa'i chos la shin tu spro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-12: mchog dam pa'i bsam bdag pas sems can thams cad la bye brag gi 'du shes med par bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi'i chos kyis mnyam par bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-13: sems can thams cad chos kyi dga' ba la longs spyod cing bde bar 'tsho bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au pa lis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di dag thos nas 'dug pa las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-15: gos tshags bcos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-16: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223a-17: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa ltar tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi shin tu srung pa'i rigs kyi @223b bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-1: rigs kyi bu mo dag chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa kun la sems mnyam par bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-6: glo bur du nyes pa mi gleng ngo zhes gsungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-7: de lta na ni ma mchis pa'i dus na dge slong tshul khrims nyams shing mi dge ba spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-8: dge sbyong ma lags par dge spyong du khas 'che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-9: tshangs par spyod pa ma lags par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba dag la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis ji lta bu'i thabs kyis gleng zhing dgar bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa au pa li la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-12: khyim pa rnams kyis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du ni gnang ba'i skabs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-14: ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du ma gnang na dga' ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-16: chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-17: ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-18: gal te bskrad na kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-21: chos bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-22: ma rtogs pa rnam pa 'di bcus tshul khrims nyams ba'i dge slong gi nyes pa glengs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:223b-23: mkhas ba dag gis ni de ltar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-0: dge 'dun ma dad par rgyal po'i spyan sngar ma rtogs @224a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-1: bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-2: dge 'dun ma dad par kun tu rgyu ba'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-3: dge 'dun ma dad par blon po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-4: dge 'dun ma dad par tshong dpon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-5: khyim bdag gi mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-6: bud med mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-7: skyes pa mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-8: ma rung bar byed pa mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-10: dge slong ma mang po'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-11: 'khon yod pa'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-12: dgra bo zhe 'gras pa'i mdun du ma rtogs bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-13: 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224a-14: ma rtogs par tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes pa gleng na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba bcu zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-0: gal te bden pa yang dag pa la brten te glengs na'ang nyes par 'gyur na bden pa ma yin pa la brten te gleng ba lta ci smos @224b te; kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-2: chos ma yin pa rnam pa 'di bcus tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi nyes ba glengs na kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa 'thob par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-3: mkhas pa dag gis de ltar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-5: mu stegs can dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-6: tshul khrims med pa'i khyim bdag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-7: mtshams med pa byas pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-8: dam pa'i chos la skur pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-9: 'phags pa rnams la smod pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-10: glen pa sems 'khrug pa dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-11: nad kyis yongs su gzir ba dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-12: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rung bar byed pa bas dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-13: bza' shing gi ra ba srung ba dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-14: dge slong chad pa ba dag gis dge slong gi nyes pa gleng ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-15: chos ma yin pa rnam pa 'di bcus dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa'i nyes pa glengs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-16: ji ste bden pa yang dag pa la brten te glengs na'ang nyes par 'gyur na bden pa ma yin par gleng ba lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:224b-17: kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-1: tshul khrims nyams pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gnas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-2: dge slong de'i nang na tshul bzhin du byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-4: yon tan lnga phrugs dang ldan pa gcig 'dug pa las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-5: gos tshags bcos la ba sti stang dang bcas pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal la; de nas tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi mdun du song la nyes pa gleng ngo zhes 'di skad gsol ba thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-7: bdag deng tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis nyes pa gleng ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-17: bde ba'i gnod pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-19: chos kyi sgron ma yun du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gleng ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-21: khyod kyi nyes pa bdag gis chos bzhin du gleng ngo zhes gsol ba thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-22: gang zag des gleng du gnang na ni chos bzhin du gleng bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-23: gal te gleng du ma gnang na phyir yang gnas brtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-24: dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bsti stang dang bcas bas 'di skad ces gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225a-25: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nyes pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-0: bdag gis chos lnga la @225b brten te gleng bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-1: de nas dge 'dun gyi nang ngan dge slong gnas brtan gyis shin tu rtogs la gleng pa bas ci gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-2: nyes pa ci byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-7: mdo sde la brten te bsdigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-8: bzho ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis dri zhing gleng bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-9: bdun shin tu zhi bar bya ba'i chos kyis gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-10: gang du mthun pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-11: de'i chos kyis zhi bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-12: gal te nyes pa chen po byas na'ang chad pa chen pos gcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-13: nyes pa 'bring byas na'ang chad pa 'bring gis gcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-14: nyes pa chung ngu byas na'ang chad pa chung ngus gcad de khrel pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-15: ngo tsha bas nyes pa mthol du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-16: de nas au pa lis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-17: nyes pa yang dag par byung ba'i sdig pa bgyis pa'i dge slong dag gal te khyim pa'i mthu las snyems sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-19: mang du thos pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-21: slob ma'i mthu la snyems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-22: mthu rnam pa de lta bus mjid bsdoms te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-23: de dge 'dun gyi ngag mi nyan la dge slong gnas brtan mdo sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-25: ma mo 'dzin pas chos bzhin du bstan cing bcos kyang nyan du mi btub pa'i dge slong de la ji ltar chad pas gcad par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:225b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-0: dge slong gnas brtan sde snod gsum 'dzin @226a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-1: pas dge 'dun la dad pa dris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-3: blon po chen po la mthu btsal ba'i pho nya thong la gdod chos bzhin du chad pas chod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-4: au pa lis yang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-6: gal te sdig pa bgyis pa'i dge slong de nor dbyig gi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-7: mang du thos pa'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-9: thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-10: blon po'ang dga' bar bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-11: thams cad chos ma lags par bgyis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-12: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong gi grogs bgyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-13: tshul khrims ngan pa tsam gyi dge slong de dag sdig pa nyam rangs su bgyid du stsal nas chos bzhin du chad pas gcad du'ang mi ster na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-14: de'i tshe de la dge 'dun gyis ji ltar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis au pa li la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-16: gal te dge slong de mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-17: mi bya ba la brten te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-18: dge 'dun gyi nang du gnas nas sdig pa chen po mngon sum du mi snang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-19: de'i tshe dge 'dun gyis skad cig gzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-20: gal te dge slong de mi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-21: mi bya ba'i sdig pa chen po mngon sum du snang bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-22: de'i tshe dge 'dun dag dad pa dris te chos bzhin du bskrad de sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226a-25: nas kyi zhing gi nang na nas la gnod pa skyes pa'ang myur gu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-1: nas bzang po sme bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-2: nas la gnod pa de snye ma ma byung ba na nas kyi bdag pos skad cig 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-3: snye ma byung ma thag pa na nas kyi bdag pos nas bzang po sme par byed do snyam bsams nas rtsa thon du phyung ste zhing de'i phyi rol tu 'dor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-4: de bzhin du mi gnas ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-5: mi bya ba'i dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa de khyim pa dang mthu rnam pa mang po snyems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-6: dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas pa spyod lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-7: cha lugs dge 'dun dang 'dra'ang dge 'dun rnam par dag ba sme bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-8: srung ma'i lhas ma glengs kyi bar du dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-9: sdig pa chen po mngon sum du mi snang na de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-10: dge 'dun gyis skad cig zhog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-11: gal te lha srung mas kyang bskul la dge 'dun gyi nang na nyes pa chen po'ang mngon sum du snang bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-12: de'i tshe dge 'dun dad pa dris te sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir skrod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-15: rgya mtsho chen por ni ro zhag lon par mi 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-16: de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi slob ma'ang tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong [?] ro dang 'dra ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-17: au pa lis yang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:226b-19: gal te tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa byed pa'i dge slong de dge 'dun dad pa dris te bskrad kyang nor rin po che'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-0: mang du thos pa'i mthu dang @227a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-2: thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-3: blon po chen po dga' bar bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-4: thams cad tshul khrims ngan pa can gyi grogs su gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-5: mthu chen pos nan gyis lhan cig tu bzhag nas tshul khrims nyams ba'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-6: dge 'dun lhan cig tu gnas na de'i tshe dge 'dun gyis de ji ltar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-8: de'i tshe dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-9: ngo tsha bar ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-10: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dag tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong de la zhe sdang mi bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-12: blon po chen po la gnod par ma gyur par gsol ba thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-13: gnas de spongs la gnas gzhan du song zhig ///
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-17: gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-18: de'i tshe de na gnas pa'i sems can dag nyon mongs pas gzir te mi dge ba spyod cing glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur nas shin tu gdul dka' ba rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-19: blon po gdol ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-20: khyim bdag gdol ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227a-21: tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-0: bram ze gdol pa can de dag la @227b sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-1: dad pa'i sems ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-4: glen pa dag shes pa snyems shing 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bus mi 'jigs pa dang; dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-5: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la 'jug cing 'bab pa de dag le dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-6: rnyed pa'i phyir tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa bgyid pa'i dge slong dang sten cing chos ma yin pa la spyod pa'i grogs su gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-7: thams cad gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la 'jug cing 'bab pa'i gnas de dag tu bdag mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyis sems can de dag la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-10: dbugs 'byung ba'i slad du bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi lta bu'i dam pa'i chos thabs kyis bstan cing drangs te de la spyod du gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-11: rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du ma tshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ba las rnam par bzlog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:227b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-0: khyod phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can dag nyon mongs pas yongs su gdungs nas sdig pa spyod cing byis pa gti mug can gdul dka' bar gyur pa gang rgyal rigs gdol @228a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-2: blon po gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-3: khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-4: tshong dpon gdol ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-5: dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-6: bram ze gdol pa can la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-10: gti mug can shes ba snyems pa can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-12: smras pa'i tshig bden pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-15: tshig ngan pas rnam par 'thing ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-16: dam pa'i chos la the tshom za zhing log par lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-17: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la mi 'jigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-18: rtag tu dang tshul ngan pa can dag la sten par dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-19: srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du spyod pa la dga' zhing g-yo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-22: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du nga'i chos 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-23: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung na'ang tshul khrims nyams shing 'jig rten gyi 'du 'dzi'i las byed par spro ba la rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-24: bram ze la sogs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228a-25: khe la brkam pas nor tshol ba'i phyir tshig tsam du smra zhing spyod pa dang mi ldan pa phan tshun du phrin can gyi ge skyel ba la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-0: khe spogs byed cing @228b 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i gtsug lag slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-1: zhing rmo ba'i las la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-2: nor rin po cheg sog cing sped pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-8: ltas bzang ngan lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-9: sman sbyar cing nad gsos pa'i nor gyis 'tsho ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-13: rin po che'i rgyan la chags shing khyim pa'i las byed pa la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-14: tshul khrims 'dral zhing sdig pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-15: dung gi sgra la khyi'i spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-16: dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-17: tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod pa khas 'che ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-18: rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-19: de dag gi ngag kyang nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-20: tshul khrims nyams bde dag kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag la sten par dga' zhing bkur sti dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-21: rim gro byed de de'i ngag nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-22: gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-25: mi slob pa la nan tan byed pa nas 'bras bu'i mthar byin gyi bar du gyur pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:228b-26: rgyal rigs gdol ba can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag gis de la phrag dog byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-3: mchod ba mi byed cing slar dag nyan bar yang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-6: mi la la zhig rin po che'i gling du phyin pa las rin po che ainda n'i la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-13: rin thang med pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs bor nas nor bu mching bu len pa ltar de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol ba can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du'ang de dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-14: ngas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rin po che'i gling du phyin nas tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-16: don dam pa la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-20: mi slob pa'i gang zag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa drug nan tan byed pa la brtson pa'i so so'i skye po dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-22: 'phags pa'i 'khor spangs nas tshul khrims nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-23: sdig pa mang po spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-24: ngo tsha ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-28: sems nga rgyal gyis dregs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-29: rnam par dkar ba'i chos dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-32: sdig pa'i dge slong dag la bsod nams kyi zhing du 'dzin cing bkur sti dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229a-34: mchod pa byed de de'i ngag nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-0: de ltar sdig @229b pa can de dag ni slob dpon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-1: slob mar bcas te gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can nga myal bar lhung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-3: sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-4: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-5: rje'u rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-6: khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-7: tshong dpon gdol pa can dang; dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-8: bram ze gdol pa can dag sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po las 'ga' zhig dang ldan nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-9: gal te kun dang ldan na sngon bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang tshig ste thal ba bzhin du 'gyur la rin po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag kyang du ma bur bcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-10: nyin mtshan du mar lce ldib cing smra mi nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-11: mi zad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-12: tshe 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams su med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-15: de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dag gi ngan par lta ba ni rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-16: blon po la sogs pas bzod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-17: slar de bas mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa mthong na de la 'di skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-19: 'di ltar dge slong 'di dag ni glen pa gti mug can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:229b-20: tshul 'chos shing 'jig rten slu ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-3: grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir bdag ni bstod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-4: gzhan la ni smod cing phrag dog gis dkrugs ma byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-6: grags pa la spro zhing chog mi shes pa yin pas bskrad par 'os pa de dag gi tshig kyang mnyan par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-7: dge slong de dag ni rdzun 'ba' zhig smra zhing bden pa'i chos dang bral bas 'brang bu thob ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-8: 'dod pa dang bral zhing zag pa yongs su zad pa'ang ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-11: mchod pa tsam 'dod pa'i phyir bas mthar gnas shing yon tan can du ston pa dag la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-16: bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-17: lam la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no zhes skur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-18: de nas rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ge gdol ba can gyi bar du thams cad kyi bas mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa la dad pa'i sems mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-20: bsti stang bya ba'i sems med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-22: bsnyen bkur byed pa la mi mos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-23: ji skad du bstan de'i tshig mi nyan te de la brnyas shing smod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230a-24: de ltar bas mthar gnas pa'i dge slong yongs su dag pa la brnyas smod pa nyid chos kyi mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-0: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung la brnyas shing smod pa ma yin @230b bas de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-3: lha la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag pa dad pa mi byed ba dag rgyal rigs gdol ba can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag thams cad khres te zhe sdang gi sems skyes nas gcig la gcig 'di skad zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-5: rgyal rigs gdol ba can dang; rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-9: bram ze gdol ba can 'di dag chos kyi mig dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tsho ba pa thams cad la ni brnyas shing dbang bzas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang med par byas te mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du gyur pas sdig pa'i las kyis ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-10: bdag cag deng phyin chad de dag gi skyabs mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-11: rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa de dag gi gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-14: slid kyang mi bsrung ngo zhes zer te lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-16: gnod sbyin dang; lha sogs pa thams cad de dag la mi skyo ba mi 'go ste yal bar gtong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-17: de bas na rgyal rigs gdol ba can la sogs pa'i yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-18: grong khyer na gnas ba'i yang dag pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:230b-19: yang dag par bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba thams cad yul de nas byung ste 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-0: ji ste 'jug ba zhig yod na'ang mi 'dod ci ba gtong ba'i bsam @231a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-1: pa skyes pas bskyab cing bsrung ba'i sems med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-6: yang dag pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang; bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba thams cad kyis rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-9: grong khyer la bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i sems med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-10: bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i sems med pas de'i tshe na yul de'i srid la nang gi dgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-11: phyi'i dgra gnyi ga ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-12: srid 'phrog pa'i phyir gcig la gcig 'tshe zhing gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-13: nad dang; mu ge la sogs pa'ang de'i dbang gis 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-14: de nas rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-15: bram ze gdol ba can gyi bar du gsol pa can de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-16: yul de na gnas pa thams cad kyang dga' zhing spro ba'i sems med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-17: sngon gyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-18: sdug pa thams cad dang yang bral nas gnyen bshes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-20: grogs kyang gcig gis gcig yid byung zhing phrad mi 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-24: ser sna byed cing sdig pa mang po 'ang byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-26: srog gcod pa nas ngan par lta ba'i bar du kun spyod cing ngo tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-27: 'dzem pa med par mchod rten gyi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231a-28: dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod cing za ba la 'gyod pa'i sems med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-0: rgyal @231b rigs gdol pa can de mdzangs shing drang po la ni sdang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-1: gcam sgyu can la ni dga' bas blon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-2: dmangs gcig la gcig gnod pa byed cing 'kho na dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-3: sha gnyer nas 'thab cing rtsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-5: g-yul sprod pa na'ang 'og ma sems mi mthun pa'i phyir g-yul yang nyes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-6: rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-11: bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can de dag thams cad ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag nyams shing nyin mtshan du mar lce lkugs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-12: shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-13: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-14: 'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-17: rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-22: bram ze la sogs pa'i gdol pa can sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su spyod pa dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-25: glen pa gti mug can shes pa snyems pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:231b-26: dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag pa'i sems med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-0: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag de la kha cig ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la cung zad dad kyang yang dag par glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas 'di snyam du bdag las shes shing mkhas pa med @232a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-2: ngas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-3: theg pa chen po'i chos la brnyas smod de 'phya zhing skur nas sems can gzhan dag kyang tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-4: klog cing 'don du'ang mi ster to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-5: de la kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dad pa cung zad thob kyang yang dag par glen pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas 'di snyam du bdag las mkhas shing shes pa med do snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-6: ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-7: theg pa chen po'i chos la brnyas shing smod de 'phya zhing skur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-8: sems can gzhan dag tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du 'chang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-12: de la kha cig ni theg pa chen po'i chos la dad pa cung zad tsam thob kyang yang dag bar glen po'i rang bzhin can du gyur pas 'di snyam du bdag las shes shes mkhas pa med do snyam nas; ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la brnyas smod de 'phya zhing skur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-14: sems can gzhan dag tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du'ang 'chang zhing 'dzin tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-15: klog cing 'don du'ang mi ster to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232a-16: gang zag de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos la brnyas skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-0: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom @232b ldan 'das la dbang za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-1: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod thams cad bshig nas bsregs te thal ba bzhin du 'jig par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-2: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad pa thams cad gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-3: tshad med pa'i sems can gyi mig 'dzar ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-4: rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-5: bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag gis sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-7: theg pa chen po'i chos bcabs te bar ched byas nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar du med par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-8: gang zag de i chos kyi mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-9: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tsho ba pa thams cad la ma gus pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-11: de'i rkyen gyis yul de srung ba'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-14: lha la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum la bsam pa dag cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-15: dad pa mi phyed pa dag rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du gdol pa can de dag thams cad la khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i sems skye ba nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-20: bram ze la sogs pa gdol pa can thams cad ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag nyams shing nyin mtshan du mar lce lkugs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:232b-21: shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-1: sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-2: 'chi 'phos nas kyang gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-4: gzhan yang; rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-9: bram ze la sogs pa'i gdol pa can rnams tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong gi rjes su zhugs pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-10: gzhung de de bzhin du rgyas par yul de na chos kyi snod du gyur pa yang dag pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa thams cad rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa la spong ba'i sems bskyed de bskyab pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-12: brgya la yul de na gnas su zin kyang chos la rten gyi khyim pa la dga' zhing gnas par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-13: sbyin bdag gi khyim du yang dang yang du 'gro bar mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-14: gal te skad cig tsam phyin na'ang tshig srung zhing mi smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-15: ji ste smra na'ang rdzun gyi bag med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-16: khyim pa'i mdun du tshul khrims nyams pa dag la 'phya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-18: tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de dag gi nyes pa mi brjod cing mi gleng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233a-19: rtag tu bsod nams kyi zhing la sten gyi tshul khrims nyams pa yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-0: tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de dag ni phyir @233b tshul khrims srung ba dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa dag la khro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-1: zhe sdang gi sems bskyed de brnyas smod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-2: rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-4: bram ze gdol pa can dag gi bar du khyim pa'i bus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-5: bud med kyi mdun du gcam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-6: sgyu sna tshogs kyis rdzun zer zhing tshul khrims srung ba de dag la 'phya zhing skur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-7: tshig ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-8: rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du de dag thams cad nga'i slob ma 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-11: spobs pa dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong la zhe sdang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-12: khro ba'i sems bskyed cing tshig rtsub po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phya zhing skur du bcug nas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-13: sems mi bde bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-16: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang 'phrog tu bcug nas 'tsho bas brel bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-18: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog tu bcug nas spyod du mi ster ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-19: la la ni btson rar bcug nas lcags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-21: shing gi gdos la sogs pa'i nan la bor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-22: la la ni lus kyi yan lag gtubs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-23: la la ni mgo gcod du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:233b-26: de ltar rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-0: bram ze gdol pa'i bar du gdol pa can de dag tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong la @234a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-1: brten nas de lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-2: mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-3: sems can gang gis mtshams med pa lnga byas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-4: tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba dag bshig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-5: mtshams med pa la nye ba'i sdig byas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-7: bcas pa'i sdig gang byas pa bas ni rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-8: bram ze gdol pa can gyi bar du tshul khrims nyams pa chos las 'gal bar byed pa la bsten pa bas sdig pa yang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-10: de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dag de ltar chos las 'gal ba'i sdig pa chen po byas mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-11: 'on kyang nga'i bstan pa la gnas shing skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-12: kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-14: cha lugs 'phags pa rnams dang mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-15: de la ni rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-17: khyim pa rnams kyis khyim pa'i chos nyid dang yang sbyar du mi gnang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-23: lus kyi yan lag gtub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-24: 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba chos ma yin pa byed pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234a-27: khyim pa rnams kyis gal te de ltar byas na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-0: gdon mi za @234b bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-1: 'di ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong la'ang chad pas gcod du mi gnang na tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba spyod pa la lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-3: dge slong gang gis tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba'i sdig las gcig nyams pa'ang tshul khrims nyams shing sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong zhes bya mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-4: bstan pa bzhin du dad pa'i dge 'dun gyis las byas pa'i sdom pa rgyun mi 'chad par yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-6: tshul khrims kyi bar du btang yang rnam par dkar ba'i chos kyi bsung tsam yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-10: sdom pa med pa rnams kyis brnyas smod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-11: chad pas gcad du mi gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-12: de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-13: 'phags pa'i chos nyan pas yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun sme bar byed cing dge sbyong gi las su bya ba'i las thams cad mi rung bar byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-14: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi longs spyod la spyod du mi dbang mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-15: 'on kyang yid mthun pa'i dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs te sdom pa thob pa ma btang bas khyim pa skye bo thams cad pas mchog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-16: rtsa ba'i sdig nyams kyang de lta bu yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-17: de ma yin pa bcas pa'i sdig phra mo gzhan nyams pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-18: de bas na rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:234b-20: khyim pa rnams kyis brnyas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-0: @235a *// chad pas gcod du mi dbang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-3: sngon 'das pa'i dus na yul ka shi zhes bya ba na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de; des gdol pa lnga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-4: khyed dengs la ri kha ba can gyi drung na glang po che mche ba drug dang ldan pa au pa li'i mig ces bya ba zhig yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-5: khyed kyis de'i mche ba phyungs la 'on cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-6: gal te khyed kyis ma thob na gson du ma re zhig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-7: de'i tshe gdol pa de dag lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-8: srog gi phyir mda' gzhu zhig thogs nas gos tshon can gyon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:235a-9: dge sbyong gi tshul ltar bcos nas ri kha ba can gyi drung du glang po che'i rgyal po gang na bar song ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-9: bdag cag 'di la ci bder 'tshal du gnong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-10: de nas srin po des bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-11: ji ste skra dang kha spu bregs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-12: chos gos gyon pa 'di la gnod byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-13: nges par mtshams med sems can dmyal bar ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-14: yun ring sdug bsngal chen po'i snod du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-15: de nas srin mo bu rnams dang 'khor du bcas pas bskor nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-16: thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-17: bdag cag sems can dmyal bas rab 'jigs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-18: de bas khyod kyi srog la gnod mi bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-19: bcings pa 'di yang bkrol te khyod btang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:239b-20: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las thar bar shog /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:250b-2: rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel gyi phyir mchod rten brtsigs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ste; dgra bcom pa'i bcing ba bkrol te mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:250b-3: stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:250b-11: rgyu'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:250b-13: gal te rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang gis sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu po bdag kyang mi byed la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:250b-17: ji snyed kyi bsod nams skyes pa de snyed kyi sdig kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:250b-24: bram ze dge ba gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig tu nye ba na ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi mig shin tu srung zhing bdag kyang shin tu sdom la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-1: 'jig rten phyi ma'i bag byed pa nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob mchos kyi snod du gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-2: chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa'ang rung; mthar ni tshul khrims med pa'ang rung ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-7: nyan thos kyi chos la bsti stang byed pa na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-10: theg pa chen po la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-13: theg pa chen po'i chos la mi 'phya mi skur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-15: theg pa chen po la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-16: theg pa chen po'i chos la rim gro byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-17: nyan cing 'dzin pa na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la mi brnyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-20: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la phrag dog mi skyed la /
