K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251a-24: theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag pa nyid mngon du byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-0: theg pa chen po la gnas pas @251b tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-2: brtson 'grus rtsom pa nas 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar du nan tan byed pa'i gang zag la rtag tu bsnyen bkur byed cing g-yog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-4: dad pa'i sems kyis bkur sti byed de 'dri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-7: tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong dag ring du spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-8: dad pas phul ba'i phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor la chos ma yin pas chud gzod du mi gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-9: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-11: dge 'dun gyi khud pa'i nor la bdag kyang thug thub mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-12: pha rol po gzhan yang thug thub tu spyod du mi 'dzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-13: theg pa gsum gyi chos smra ba'i gang zag la shin tu bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod cing mthu bstang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-14: pha rol po gzhan dag 'phya zhing skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-15: smod du mi gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-16: rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la shin tu dad pas spro ba skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-17: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 'phags pa'i bka' la dad cing 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-19: phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi gnas gtsug lag khang skyong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:251b-20: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob ma dag la dbang mi za zhing phyir yang khyim bar mi 'bebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-0: sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po dag la bdag kyang mi spyod cing pha rol po gzhan @252a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-1: yang sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po yongs su spongs shig par gros 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-2: rgyal po snga ma'i chos lugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-3: srid kyis 'tsho zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi gyis 'jig rten mang po yongs su sdud cing ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-4: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-5: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'tsho ba cing shin tu rgyas par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-6: chos kyi mig nam du'ang mi nub par srung ba'i rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du de dag de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pas na de dag 'tsho bas spyod pa chud zad par mi 'gyur ba dang; lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-10: lus srul po la sogs pa thams cad kyang dga' ste byams pa'i sems kyis srung zhing skyob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-11: chos kyi snod du gyur ba bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag ba thams cad kyang dga' zhing snying rje'i sems kyis skyob cing rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-12: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas pa'i yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-13: skye bo thams cad kyang phyir zhing bde la shin tu skyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-14: phyi'i dgras kyang gnod pa byed ma nus shing thams cad bka' nyan te ma pham par ngang 'du ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-15: de'i dbang gis dge ba'i phyogs la phyir zhing brtson te mi dge ba'i rgyud yongs su skems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252a-17: mi la sogs pa yongs su rgyas shing kun tu srung ba'i phyir tshe shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-0: bdag gi nyon mongs pa yongs @252b su 'jom zhing pha rol po'i nyon mongs pa'ang 'jil bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bzung bas log par lta ba'i lam ngan pa thams cad yongs su bcom pas 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor yun ring por 'khor ba las ldog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-2: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spong zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag tu sten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-3: gang nas gang du skye ba'i gnas thams cad du sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-4: byang chub sems dpa' dang phrad cing bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-5: mchod ba rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-6: ring po mi thogs par bsam pa bzhin du gang nas gang du dga' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-7: de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-8: de nas de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas sha za'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi bar du 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtug te thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:252b-10: ma mchis pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig tu nye ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-0: gal te rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dag pa'i bar du gang sdig pa'i 'khor lo bcu po bdag kyang yongs su spangs la gzhan @253a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-1: yang yongs su spongs shig par gros 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-3: gzhan srung ba la mkhas pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-6: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdun 'tsho ba cing rgyun mi 'chad par rgyas par bgyid pa nas mdor na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar gang zag de dag la sogs pa theg pa gsum gyi chos la bsti stang des bcas pas nyan cing 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-8: theg pa gsum la gnas pa'i gang zag la shin tu srung zhing mchod pa bgyid de gnod pa mi bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-9: dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rdzas la shin tu srung zhing god par mi bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du de dag la bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-11: chos rnam pa 'di bcu'ang skye zhing 'phel bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-14: bgegs med pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-15: nad med pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-18: rin po che skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-19: 'tsho ba'i yo byad skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-21: grags pa skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-22: dge ba'i grogs po skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253a-23: shes rab skye zhing 'phel ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-0: gal te rgyal @253b rigs dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-1: bram ze dge ba'i bar du sdig pa'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po yongs su spong zhing pha rol po gzhan yang spong bar gros 'debs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-2: yon tan sngar smos pa dang ldan na bdag kyang srung zhing skyob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-3: chos rnam pa bcu po'ang skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-6: rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang sngar smos pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan na bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas de la bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-7: chos rnam pa bcu po 'di dang yongs su bral bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-9: 'di lta ste; dgra zhe 'gras pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-10: yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-14: reg bya'i yul dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-16: nad thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-17: log par 'dzin cing ngan par lta ba thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-18: log pa la skyabs su 'gro ba dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-19: log pa'i ltas ngan pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-20: log pa'i las ngan pa'i dngos po thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-21: log pa'i bshes gnyen ngan pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-22: khyim na gnas pa'i 'dam rdzab thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:253b-23: dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad dang yongs su bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-1: gal te shin tu dge ba'i rgyal rigs nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang zhig yon tan sngar gsungs pa rnams dang ldan na bdag cag 'khor dang bcas te de la srung zhing skyob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-2: yongs su bral ba'i chos rnam pa bcu po 'di'ang thob par bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-5: rgyal rigs dge ba nas bram ze dge ba'i bar du gang gis sngar gsungs pa'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par nan tan byed na bdag cag 'khor dang bcas te bsrung zhing bskyab par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-6: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-7: yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang chos rnam pa 'di bcu dang yongs su bral bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-9: yul pha rol gyi dgra thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-10: bdag gi yul gyi dgra thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-11: bkra mi shis pa'i yi dvags thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-12: than pa dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-13: gnod par 'gyur ba'i char chu dang yongs su bral ba dang; dus ma lags pa'i tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-18: ser pa gnod par 'gyur ba thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-20: ltas ngan du gyur pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254a-21: mu ge'i gnod pa thams cad dang yongs su bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-0: dus ma yin par nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang yongs su bral ba @254b dang; log par 'dzin cing ngan par lta ba thams cad dang yongs su bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-2: gal te rgyal rigs dge ba'i rgyal pos yon tan sngar gsungs pa de dag kun la nan tan bgyid cing yongs su rdzogs par byed na bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung zhing bskyab par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-3: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-4: yul de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang yongs su bral ba'i chos bcu po 'di dag thob par bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa nas sha za'i dbang po'i bar du 'khor dang bcas pa la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-6: legs so zhes bstod nas khyed rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-8: yi dam bcas pa'i dngos po 'di dag khyed kyis bya ba'i rigs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-9: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis khyed la'ang yun ring por phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-11: de nas tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-12: ma mchis pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs dge ba thams cad kyi slad du yul srung ba la sems phyir mi ldog pa'i gzungs chen po'i tshig 'di dag 'bul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:254b-13: yul yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i tshig 'di'i gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-0: mthus ma mchis pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal rigs dge ba'i rgyal po thams cad la phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad kyis @255a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-2: phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad zhi zhing rang ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-5: yid kyi las shin tu sdom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-6: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags shing bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-7: sdig pa'i chos yongs su spong zhing dge ba'i chos la rtag tu nan tan bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-9: ngan par phyogs pa rtag tu spong zhing theg pa chen po la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pas nan tan bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-10: snod du gyur pa'i sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-11: shes pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'brang bar mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rin po che'i gter rdzogs par nan tan bgyid pas khong khro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-13: phrag dog la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-15: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas skyob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-16: bya ba rnams la brjed mi ngas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-17: bsdu ba rnam bzhi'i dngos po la dga' bas sems can mi gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-18: rtag tu chos kyi snod bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255a-19: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-0: khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal po rgyal rigs @255b dge ba'i yul bsrung ba'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i tshig smros shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-1: yul yongs su bsrung ba la phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i tshig gi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-2: gzi brjid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'dir rgyal po rgyal rigs dge ba thams cad la phas rgol ba'i dgra thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa nas de bzhin du rgyas par sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-3: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi bar du thams cad dang mi 'bral bar bsrung bar 'gyur ba smros shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-8: mu ni khi li dha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-9: mu ni ri ga bi tsa le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-16: to ra na kri tsa le /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-17: pa ta la ga sha kri te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-21: tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying pos gzungs 'di dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das la'ang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:255b-23: 'khor mang po dang bcas te bdag gis bshad pa'i gzungs chen po 'di la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:256a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:256a-13: gzi brjid che bar 'gyur ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:256b-28: dad pas srid pa'i rgya mtshor sgrol 'gyur //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-0: bshad pa thos nas gang la gnod dang gang la phan @259b bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-1: gang zhig chos 'di thos pas gong nas gong du 'phar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-2: gang gis chos 'di thos pas phyir zhing ltung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-3: ji ltar 'dus byas kun gyi skyon gyis skyo bas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-4: rga dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho myur du skems par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-5: nyin mtshan dge ba rnams la shin tu brtson pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-6: don mchog gang la gnas shing theg pa gang bgrod pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-7: shin tu yangs shing zab pa'i chu bo bzhi las sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-8: 'jig rten skyong bas rnam par phye ste kun srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-12: khyod skye bo tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-13: bde ba'i don gyi phyir lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-15: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don chen po'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu zab mo'i don 'di dag zhus pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-16: shin tu legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-17: ngas khyod la rnam par phye ste bshad do zhes bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-21: gang zag rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni 'khor bar 'khor zhing mi lus shin tu rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-22: gang zag rnam pa bcu gang zhen /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba mi skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:259b-25: bsod nams kyi las mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-0: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nying mtshams @260a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-2: grogs po sdig pa'i rjes su spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-3: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la 'jigs bar mi lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-5: zhe sdang bdo bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-6: gti mug bdo bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-8: log par lta ba'i sdig pa can dam du 'dzin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-9: gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba rnam pa bcu po 'di'i rgyus sems can dag tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba'i 'jig cing tshul khrims nyams par byed pas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-10: gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba rnam pa bcu po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-12: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dag la la ni lhag pa'i spyod pa nyams la mos pa ma nyams pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-13: la la ni mos pa nyams la lhag pa'i spyod pa ma nyams pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-14: la la ni lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-15: mos pa gnyis ka nyams pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-16: la la ni tshul khrims nyams la lta ba ma nyams pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-17: la la ni lta ba nyams la tshul khrims ma nyams pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-18: la la ni tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-19: lta ba gnyis ka nyams pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-20: la la ni lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260a-23: lta ba ma nyams kyang sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur te gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba dag byed pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-0: la la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa'i dbang du gyur kyang gleng pa'i rang bzhin can lug bzhin du @260b lkugs pa las kyi dngos po'i bye brag kyang mi phyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-2: mi dge ba'i chos bstan pa thos kyang mi go mi 'dzin mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-3: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba dag byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-6: 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mi skyo bar kun tu 'tshol ba'i rgyus sems 'khrugs pas gnas shing spyad par mi bya ba dag byed pa'i 'dus byas kyi nad mang pos gzir cing gdungs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha rjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-7: sngags la sogs pa byed pa de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-8: spyad par mi bya ba dag byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-10: spyad par mi bya ba rnam pa bcu po'i rgyus sems can dag tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba nyams shing mthong ba'i chos la 'phags pa'i snod du ma gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-11: tshul khrims nyams pa'i phyir ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-13: gang zag gang lhag pa'i spyod pa nyams kyang mos pa ma nyams pa dag gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-14: spyad par mi bya ba gang yang rung ba rnam pa gcig gi rgyus rtsa ba'i sdig gcig nyams pa las de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-15: ngo tsha bas phyin chad gang yang mi byed par sdig pa spangs na de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir lam sun 'byin pa'i dge sbyong zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:260b-17: de lta bu'i sdig pa chen po'i las byas kyang 'phral du mi 'chab par mthol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-3: ngo tsha bas so sor bshags pas sdig pa byang ba'i phyir phyin chad byed pa'i rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-4: des dge sbyong gi las dang; cho gar bya ba thams cad kyi nang du mi chud la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-5: bskrad par bya zhing dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la'ang spyod du mi dbang mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-6: gang zag de ni theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi snod du 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i phyir de la bar mar ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyang 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-8: bar bar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyang 'chag do; ;bar bar ni de la bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos kyang bshad pas skye ba gnyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-9: gsum na smon lam gyi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mthus sdig pa'i las byas pa sdig par gyur pa thams cad byang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-11: la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-12: la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas mya ngan las 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-13: la la ni shin tu rgya che ba bla na med pa'i theg pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-14: gzhung de bzhin du tshul khrims nyams la lta ba mnyams pa'ang shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-15: gang zag gang mos pa nyams la lhag pa'i spyod pa ma nyams chen de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i gnas pa ni bslab pa'i chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261a-16: 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i snod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-0: 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod @261b dang ldan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-1: gang zag gang lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-2: mos pa gnyi ga nyams na de theg pa gang gi chos kyi snod du'ang mi 'gyur mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-4: gang zag gang lta ba nyams la tshul khrims ma nyams na de theg pa gang gi chos kyi snod du'ang mi 'gyur mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-5: de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos bshad de ngan par lta ba spangs te lus 'di nyid kyis nyan thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-6: rang sangs rgyas chos kyi chos rtogs par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-7: yang na skye ba gzhan gyi dus chad cing rtogs par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-8: gang zag gang tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-9: lta ba gnyis gnyams na de ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i bsngags pa 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-11: gang zag gang lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-14: lta ba kun ma nyams kyang sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du gyur te rten cing gnas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-15: de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsngags shing 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:261b-16: gang zag gang zhig dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten du zin kyang ngan cing glen pa'i rang bzhin can lug bzhin du lkugs shing dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-0: mi dge ba gang yang brda mi phrad pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas phan gdags pa'i phyir kha ton goms par bya ba'i phyir bsngags pa 'chad @262a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-1: do; ;gang zag gang 'dod chags kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-2: 'dus byas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lta bas myos pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba tshol ba la ni 'khor ba las byung bar byed pa nyan thos kyi theg pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-3: chad par lta ba la ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi bsngags pa 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-4: rtag par lta ba la ni khams gsum gyi srid pa'i rgyun 'di dag nas shi 'phos nas gzhan du skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-5: rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ltar rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-6: mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-11: tshig dang; sgra skad kyis bstan pa thams cad 'bras bu med cing don med pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-12: kun kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du ma bstan pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-13: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur nas sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos kyi mig bcar ba'i sdig pa yin pas mtshams med pa las 'das pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-14: mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262a-15: gang gis ngas sems can la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-0: bde ba'i phyir gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa @262b la brten te gsungs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brten te gsungs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-2: theg pa chen po la brten te gsungs pa gang la'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-6: chung du na tshigs su bcas pa gcig tsam 'chab pa'i las byas na de ni dam pa'i chos la skur pa yin par rigs par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-7: 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad med par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-8: sems can thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi mig nyams par byed pa yin pas gang zag de ni de ltar bdag kyang don med pa chen po spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-9: pha rol po gzhan don med pa chen po spyod du 'jug pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-10: yang gang zag de ni khrel pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-11: ngo tsha ba med pa'i dge 'dun la rten cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur ba 'debs pa'o zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-13: dge slong rnam pa bzhi yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-15: don dam pa'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-16: kun rdzob kyi dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-17: lug lkugs pa lta bu'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-19: ngo tsha ba med pa'i dge slong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-20: de la ji ltar na don dam pa'i dge slong gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong yon tan chen po dang ldan pa chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:262b-24: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-2: gang zag rnam pa bdun po 'di dag ni don dam pa'i dge slong du bsdu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-3: skye bo gang khyim na gnas shing skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-6: rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims thams cad kyang ma mnos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-10: tshul gyi las thams cad kyi nang du mi chud mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-11: 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan la 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob pas na de'ang don dam pa'i dge slong du bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-12: de dag ni don dam pa'i dge slong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-13: de la ji ltar na kun rdzob kyi dge slong gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-15: kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon cing rab tu byung la so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan na de ni kun rdzob kyi dge slong zhes bya'o; ;de la ji ltar na lug lkug pa lta bu'i dge slong zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-16: rtsa ba'i sdig la sogs pa nyams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-20: nyes pa phra mo rnam pa sna tshogs byas kyang 'gyod cing mthol mi shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-21: nyes pa byas pa la sla gyad byed cing sdig pa phra mo la mi lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-23: mkhas pa'i skyes bu la ni mi sten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-24: skabs skabs su mang du thos pa shes rab dang ldan pa la bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263a-26: bsti stang dang bcas te zhu zhing 'dri ba'ang mi shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-1: sdig pa med pa ni gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-3: gang byas na ma legs pa'ang zhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-4: 'dri ba mi byed pa'i gang zag de dag ni lug lkugs pa lta bu'i dge slong du bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-5: lug lkugs ba lta bu'i dge slong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-6: de la ji ltar na khrel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-7: ngo tsha ba med pa'i dge slong gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-8: sems can gang 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir nga'i bstan pa la phyogs te rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-9: rab tu byung nas so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims srung ba thams cad nyams te khrel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-10: ngo tsha ba med pa la 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la mi lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-12: khong rul cing btsog pas gang ba'i srin kva lva 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-13: dung gi sgra la khyi'i spyod pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-14: rtag tu rdzun smra zhing bden pa'i tshig med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-18: nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-19: las kyi mchog dam pa gsum las ring du gyur pa khe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-21: grags pa la chags te yul drug la mos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-26: reg bya'i yul la chags pa'i gang zag de dag ni khrel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-27: ngo tsha ba med pa dam pa'i chos la 'bya zhing skur ba'i nang du bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-28: de ni khrel ba dang; ngo tsha ba med pa'i dge slong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:263b-30: don dam pa'i dge slong zhes bya ba ni la la 'phags pa'i lam las rgyal ba'i dge sbyong gi nang du bsdu ba'ang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-1: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni gang 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad la gnas shing bdag kyang nyon mongs pa'i chu bo las sgrol la pha rol po gzhan dag kyang sgrol ba'o; ;de'ang ji lta zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-5: gang zag rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni srid pa'i yan lag gi 'khor thams cad dang ring du gyur pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam las rgyal ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par chos thams cad la ye shes kyis thogs pa med par gzigs shing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-8: bde ba'i don gyis sdud pa'ang lam las rgyal ba'i dge sbyong gi nang du bsdu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-9: don dam pa'i dge slong dang; kun rdzob kyi dge slong kha cig ni lam ston pa'i dge slong gi nang du bsdu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-10: gang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-11: yang dag pa'i dge ba'i skye bo nas 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba dang ldan pa'i bar du shes pa brda sprod pa la brten te cho 'phrul gyi mthus gzhan la 'phags pa'i lam gyi chos rnam par phye ste ston cing 'chad pa'i gang zag de ni lam ston pa'i dge sbyong tha ma ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-12: lam ston pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264a-13: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gang zag ni gnyis pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-0: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob @264b pa'i gang zag ni gsum pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-1: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gang zag de ni bzhi pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun ni lnga pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-4: sa dang po la gnas pa nas sa bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-5: srid pa tha ma'i lus la gnas pa de'ang lam ston pa'i dge sbyong gi nang du bsdu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-6: gang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan zhing sbyod lam rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa dag ni lam gyis 'tsho ba'i dge sbyong gi nang du bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-7: lam gyis srog 'dzin pa'i phyir lam gyis 'tsho ba'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-10: bde ba'i don du bsdus cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nan tan byed pa dang ldan pa de'ang lam gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-11: de ltar lam las rgyal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-13: lam gyis 'tsho ba'i dge sbyong rnam pa gsum po 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-14: de las gzhan pa'i dge sbyod dag ni lam sun 'byin pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-15: yang dag pa ma yin mod kyi de yang bsod nams kyi zhing gi grangs su 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:264b-17: ngo tsha ba med pa'i dge 'dun la gnas shing brten pa'i gang zag de ni ngas yang dag par bstan pa'i 'dul ba'i chos las mi ro lta bu'o zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-0: yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun gyi rgya mtsho las dbyung bar bya ba @265a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-1: chos kyi snod ma yin pas na gang zag de la nga ni ston pa chen po yin no zhes mi gsungs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-2: gang zag de'ang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-3: ngo tsha med pa'i dge slong chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa dag nga la ston par 'dzin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-5: nga'i sku'i gzugs brnyan la shin tu dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-8: 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la'ang shin tu dad pas bdag kyang lta ba ngan par mi 'dzin la pha rol po gzhan yang lta ba ngan pa la chags par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-9: ngas bstan pa'i chos rgyas par ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-10: shin tu bsngags shing bstod pa byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-11: de la 'phya ba'am; skur ba mi 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-12: rtag tu yang dag pa'i smon lam 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-13: sdig pa byas ma thag tu yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-14: yang mthol cing 'gyod de spong na las kyi sgrib pa mang po zhi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-15: de ltar gang zag de dkon mchog gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-16: 'phags pa'i tshul khrims la dad pa'i shugs kyis mu steg can dgu bcu rtsa lnga bas brgya stong snyed kyis lhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-17: myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du phyin pa ni ma yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-18: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal pos kyang mi skur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-19: de ma yin pa skye bo gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265a-20: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-0: myong ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa tha dad par mkhyen cing gzigs pa'i phyir @265b gang 'di skad du nga'i bstan pa'i chos la dad nas skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-2: gos dur smrig gyon pa la rgyal rigs la sogs pa gshe zhing spyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-3: chad pas gcad du mi dbang ngo zhes gsung te; gang gis brnyas smad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-4: rab tu byung ba thams cad la gshe zhing sbyos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-5: chad pas bcad na kha na ma tho ba'i 'bras bu smin ba ni ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-6: gzhan yang nga'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-8: kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig gyon na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-11: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis thugs rjes rjes su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-14: chos gos gyon pa la'ang 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-16: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang thugs rjes rjes su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-18: kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba la brnyas smad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-21: bltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la brnyas smod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-22: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mkhas pas blo can sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing 'jigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:265b-25: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba 'dod pa dag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-0: kha spu bregs nas gos dur smrig gyon pa la brnyas @266a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-3: gang ngo tsha ba med pa'i dge sbyong tshul khrims nyams pa theg pa gsum gyi 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa dag nyid lta ba ngan pa'i sdig pa la mngon par zhen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-5: lta ba ngan pa'i sdig pa la chags par byed pa de la rgyal rigs dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-9: khyim bdag dang; tshong dpon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-13: bud med dag med do zhes smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-16: ma'ang med pa nas dge ba dang; mi dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-17: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-18: 'phags pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu thob pa'ang med do zhes smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-19: chos thams cad rgyu las skyes pa ma yin no zhes smra ba dang; gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-20: gzugs yod pa'i khams ni rtag pa yin gyi 'jig pa'i chos ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-21: gang gzugs med pa'i khams ni rtag pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-22: 'jig pa'i chos ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-23: la la ni mu steg can gyi brtul bshugs kyis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-24: la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-26: theg pa chen pos ma yin par 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266a-27: nyan thos kyi theg pa la dad cing yid ches nas bsngags shing bstod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-1: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-2: theg pa chen po la 'phya zhing skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-3: smod cing bar chad byed pa bgegs byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-4: ston du mi ster ba'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-5: la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa 'thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-7: theg pa chen pos ma yin par 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dad cing yid ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-12: theg pa chen po la 'phya zhing skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-13: smod cing bar chad byed pa la bgegs byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-14: ston du mi ster ba'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-15: la la ni theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa 'thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-16: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ma yin par 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-18: theg pa chen po la bdag dad cing yid ches pas pha rol gzhan yang dad cing yid ches par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-20: bkur sti byed pas pha rol po gzhan yang rim gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-22: bdag de la bstod cing bsngags pas pha rol po gzhan yang bstod cing bsngags su bcug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-23: bdag glegs bam du bris pas pha rol po gzhan yang glegs bam du 'drir bcug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:266b-24: bdag klog cing 'don pas pha rol po gzhan yang klog cing 'don du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-0: bdag nyan cing 'dzin pas pha rol po gzhan dag kyang nyan cing @267a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-2: bdag sems shing yid la byed pas pha rol po gzhan yang sems shing yid la byed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-3: skye bo chos kyi snod du gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-4: snod du ma gyur pa'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-5: thams cad la theg pa chen po don dam pa shin tu zab pa phra ba rnam par 'byed cing ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'phya zhing skur ba 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-9: bar chad byed de ston du mi ster ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-10: bdag ma dad pas gzhan dad pa skye ba'i bgegs byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-11: bdag rim gro mi byed pas gzhan rim gro byed pa'i bgegs byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-12: bdag mi bstod pas gzhan bstod pa'i bgegs byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-13: bdag glegs bam du mi 'dri bas gzhan glegs bam du 'dri ba'i bgegs byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-19: yid la mi byed pas gzhan klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-24: yid la byed pa'i bgegs byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-25: theg pa gnyis kyi chos mi ston pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-26: la la ni sbyin pa 'ba' zhig byas bas mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa 'thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-28: bzod pas ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267a-29: la la ni tshul khrims 'ba' zhig gis mthar sbyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-0: @267b bzod pas ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-1: la la ni bzod pa 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-3: tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-4: la la ni brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-6: tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-7: la la ni bsam gtan 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-9: tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-10: la la ni shes rab 'ba' zhig gis mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-12: tshul khrims kyis ma yin pa nas bsam gtan gyi bar du ma yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-13: la la ni 'jig rten gyi bzo rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs shing shes pas mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-14: la la ni brag las mchod ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-15: me ma mur du mchod ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-16: smyung ba la sogs pa'i brtul shugs kyi rnam pa mang pos mthar phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa thob par 'dzin te ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:267b-18: de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong chos kyi snod ma yin pa des rdzun rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos kyi snod kun bslus te skye bo mang po lta ba ngan pa la bltar btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-1: dag phyin ci log tu ngan par lta ba'i dbang gis rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-4: bud med la sogs pa dang pa yongs su dag pa dag ma rung bar byed nas tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-7: shes rab kyang nyams par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-8: rgyal rigs gdol pa can nas rje'u rigs gdol pa can gyi bar du thams cad gdol pa can du bsgyur bas de dag ni chos kyi snod ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-9: tshul khrims mnyams pa'i dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-10: rgyal rigs gdol pa can la sogs pa ston pa dang slob mar bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-13: ji ltar mi ro bam nas rul cing zhig pa las 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong zhing snar mnam pa reg ma thag tu 'jig pa dang nye'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-14: 'bags nam nam pa bzhin du rgyal rigs dge ba nas dmangs rigs dge ba'i bar du tshul khrims nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-16: chos kyi snod ma yin pa de la bsnyen tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-19: las lhan cig byed na de ma thag tu dran par lta ba btsog cing mnam pa gos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268a-21: de ltar de bzhin du rgyal rigs dge ba nas dmangs rigs dge ba'i bar du dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-0: tshul khrims @268b dang; thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-3: gdol pa can du gyur pas de ni ston pa dang slob ma bcas te dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pas na mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-6: de ltar rgyal rigs la sogs pa skye bo tshad med pa tshul khrims nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-8: chos kyi snod ma yin pa'i dge slong la bsten pas dge ba'i chos thams cad nyams pa nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bar du ltung bar 'gyur ba la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-9: de bas na mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba'i bar du 'dod pa dag lam las rgyal ba'i dge sbyong la bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-11: bkur sti byas te theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi mdo mnyan par gsol ba gdab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-13: lam ston pa nas lam gyis 'tsho ba'i dge sbyong btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-14: lam de gsum la gnas pa'i dge sbyong med na'ang lam sun 'byin pa'i dge sbyong btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-16: yang dag par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-18: lhag pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pas de la ni bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-19: mchod pa dag byos la theg pa gsum gyi don dri bar bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-22: lta ba kun nyams pa la ni bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:268b-23: mchod pa bya ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-1: nyams pa dag tshul khrims nyams mod kyi log par mi lta la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-4: lta bar ldan pas na de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-5: de gang na bar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-8: theg pa chen po'i chos zhu zhing mnyan par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-9: brnyas shing smad par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-10: theg pa gsum las gang yang rung ba zhig la dad de smon lam 'debs shing brtson 'grus rtsom zhing rjes su slob kyang theg pa gzhan la'ang brnyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-12: gang gis theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-13: gcig gi tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la brnyas smod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-14: de la ni bsnyen bkur ba mi bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-19: gang gis de la bsnyen bkur byed cing bsten tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-22: las lhan cig byed na gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-24: de bas na theg pa gsum las gang yang rung ba gcig la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:269a-25: 'khor ba las 'da' zhing rab tu bde ba la mos te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:274b-20: bdag ston cing 'chad na gzhan yang ston cing 'chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:274b-23: rgya cher spel du gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:274b-24: gal te snod du ma gyur na bdag kyang mi nyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:274b-25: gzhan yang nyan du mi gzhug pa nas gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-2: sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson zhing su nan tan byed pa dang mi dge ba'i las thams cad yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-6: ci la mos pa bzhin du yang dag pa'i smon lam gdab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-7: gang de ltar byed pa ni lus 'di nyid kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i snod du'ang 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs las kyang phyir mi ldog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-9: theg pa chen po'i rigs las kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-10: de bas na theg pa gsum char la'ang bslab cing nan tan bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-11: nga rgyal gyis theg pa chen po pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-12: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-14: ngas sngon theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa brtan par spyod pa 'ba' zhig la de skad du theg pa chen po sgom pa 'ba' zhig gis mtha'i gnas byed par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa dang 'dir 'gal ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-16: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mngon sum //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-17: rdo rje'i snying pos nga la zhus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-18: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-19: ci phyir mchod pa gyis shig ces skul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275a-20: sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun kyang nyams nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-0: glen zhing @275b ngan par lta ba 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-1: chos kyi snod min lam sun 'byin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-2: spyo 'am chad pas gcad du mi gnang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-3: de las theg pa gsum gyi dam chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-4: yang dag pa yi rnam par grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-5: sman bzang lta bu bshad pa thos na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-6: zhi ba'i mya ngan 'das 'gyur zhes gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-7: ci yi phyir na mdo sde gzhan las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-8: theg pa chen po gcig gi 'grol 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-9: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la slob spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-10: yang 'dir theg pa gsum bshad ci phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-11: sems can kun la thugs brtse can gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-12: ngan par lta ba'i las kun spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-13: phan pa dang ni bde ba'i don phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-14: rnam par grol zhing the tshom gcod gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-15: rgyal rigs rgyal po dag la phan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-16: rje'u rigs dmangs rigs par du bde phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-17: dge slong dag la gnod byed mi gnang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-18: kha na ma tho chen po'i sdig gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-19: kha spu bregs shing ngur smrig gos gyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-20: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-21: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi mig yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-23: spyod lam mang po yongs su nyams kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-24: rnam par grol ba yongs su spangs min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-25: ngan par lta ba'i sdig pa spangs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-27: ji ltar sman rab 'khus par gyur kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-28: nad rnams kun la shin tu phan 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-29: de bzhin spyod lam nyams pa de yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-30: pha rol sdug bsngal zhi bar byed 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-31: zhi ba'i las dang gso sbyin dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:275b-32: dge sbyong de ni der 'dug ma gnang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-1: dam pa'i chos ston dbang ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-2: gnyi gas bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-3: dkon mchog gsum la dad cing phyogs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-4: nga la ston pa chen por 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-5: mi dge sdig pa mang po spong 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-6: mu stegs mang po gang bas de mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-7: ji ltar srin mo'i gling du 'khyams pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-8: 'jigs shing skrag pa'i tshong pa de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-9: kun gyis rta spu nyag re bzung bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-10: rgya mtsho las brgal bgegs dang bral ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-11: de ltar tshul khrims nyams pa de ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-12: mi dge ngan par lta ba spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-13: dad pa gcig gi rgyu yi mthus na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-14: nyon mongs pa yi srin las thar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-15: rnam par grol ba'i rgyal mtshan bsrungs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-16: sangs rgyas mang pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-17: tshul khrims nyams la gnod mi byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-18: kha na ma tho'i sdig lci spong 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-19: bsod nams chen po la ni mos shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-20: yang dag rnam par grol la dga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-21: snod dang snod min kun la mnyam srung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-22: des ni rnam grol thob par mi dka'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-23: glen pa nga rgyal theg pa chen por //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-24: khas 'che de ni shes pa'i mthu med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-25: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la rmongs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-26: theg pa chen por rig 'gyur ci smos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-27: dper na mig gi 'bras bu nyams na; ;kha dog rnam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-28: de bzhin dad pa nyams shing med na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-29: theg pa chen po shes par mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276a-30: chu bran btung ba'i mthu yang med na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-0: rgya mtsho chen po ga la rdub @276b nus; ;theg pa gnyis kyang goms mi nus na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-1: theg pa chen po ga la slob nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-2: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la dad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-3: theg pa chen po la ni dad 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-4: theg chen chos la dad pa med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-5: tshig du smra bas don du mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-6: nang ni yang dag chad par lta zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-7: theg pa chen po can zhes khas 'che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-8: mi dge gsum gyi las ni mi srung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-9: nga yi dam chos ma rung 'jig byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-10: gang zag de ni tshe 'phos gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-11: mtshams med sems can dmyal bar ltung nges //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-12: de bas dbang po brtan cing bshad bya'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-13: snod du ma gyur pa la ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-14: byams pa'i sems med nga rgyal dregs zhing; ;gtum zhing brlang ba dbang po zhan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-15: de ni chad par lta ba yin par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-16: mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag shes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-17: nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-18: theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-19: sangs rgyas kun la smad cing skur bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-20: nges par mtshams med dmyal bar ltung 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-22: slob dpon 'chab cing sdug bsngal 'jigs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-23: mkhas pa dag gis shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-24: de ni nyan thos theg pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-25: sbyin la dga' zhing skye 'gag rtog pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-26: bas mtha'i gnas la dga' ba dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-27: rang rgyal ba yi theg pa yin par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-28: mkhas pa dag gis shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-29: dge ba'i rtsa ba kun dang ldan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-30: byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-31: rtag tu phan pa'i don la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:276b-32: de ni theg pa chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-2: sems can dag la mi 'tshe mi gnod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-3: stong pa nyid kyi chos la brtson pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-4: theg pa chen po yin par shes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-5: thams cad chos la sems kyis bzod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-6: smra ba'i tshig 'jam 'jungs pa med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-7: chos la rtag tu dga' zhing spro ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-8: de yang theg pa chen po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-9: chos kyi snod dang snod min kun la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-10: bsam pa mnyam pas phan pa'i don byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-11: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-12: de yang theg chen yin par shes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-13: de bas mkhas pa blo can dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-14: theg pa gsum la shin tu dad bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-15: dge 'dun dag la gnod mi byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-16: myur du bla med byang chub 'grub 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-26: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-27: bud med de dag gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-28: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na lus 'di nyid kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs las ldog cing nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-29: tshe 'di nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-30: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-31: theg pa chen po'i snod du ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277a-34: bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i dad pas dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-0: mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yod par yid @277b ches pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-3: ldan pas mi dge ba'i grogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-4: ngan par lta ba thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-5: sdom pa la shin tu gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-6: srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba nas bag med par 'gyur ba'i khu ba 'thung ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-7: byams pa'i sems la gnas te zhe sdang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-8: khong khro ba thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-9: snying rje'i sems la gnas te sems can nyam thag pa thams cad sgrol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-10: dga' ba'i sems la bde bar gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-11: ngag gi las mi dge ba bzhi yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-12: btang snyoms kyi sems la gnas te; 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-14: phrag dog thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-15: yang dag pa la phyogs te slu [?] ba'i ltas bzang ngan kun yongs su spong zhing log pa mu stegs can la mi sten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-16: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan te dge ba'i chos kun la nan tan byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-17: rtag tu gnas dgon pa la dga' zhing chos kyi don tshol ba la mi skyo bar spro ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-19: rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-20: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-21: bud med de dag gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-22: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na tshe 'di nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs las ldog cing nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:277b-23: tshe 'di nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos mngon du gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-1: chos kyi snod du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-3: theg pa chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos mngon du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-5: theg pa chen po'i snod du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-6: gzhung des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-7: theg pa chen po'ang shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-10: spyad par ldan pa'i 'khor lo bcu po de dag ni nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thun mong du yod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-16: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang thun mong pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-20: gang rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-21: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-22: bud med de dag gnas pa dang spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na tshe 'di nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs las kyang nyam par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-24: lus 'di nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos rigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278a-30: yid kyi las rnam par dag par spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-0: @278b ngo tsha ba dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-1: bdag gi lus kyis skyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-2: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la shin tu 'jigs pa skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-3: 'khor ba'i 'dod pa las shin tu brgal dka' bar lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-4: rtag tu dben pa'i gnas la dga' zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-5: bas mtha' dgon pa la dga' zhing gzhan gyi skyon mi gleng pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-6: dbang po rnams sdom zhing sems rtag tu zhi bas ting nge 'dzin du byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-7: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba la mkhas pas rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-8: 'bras bu la shin tu rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-9: rtag tu bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-10: kun nas ldang ba'i chos yongs su 'gog pa la mkhas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-12: rgyal rigs dge ba nas rje'u rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-13: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-14: bud med de dag gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-15: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas tshe 'di nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs las phyir mi ldog cing nyams pa yod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-16: tshe 'di nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos mngon du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-20: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:278b-21: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-0: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'khor lo 'di la gnas na myur du srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho las brgal te mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen @279a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-4: spyad par bya ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-5: de la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-6: bdag gi ba'i gnas su bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-7: 'dud par byed pa dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-8: 'brel bar byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-9: de la spyod pa zhes bya ba ni phung po spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-12: 'brel ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-13: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni bslab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-16: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni shing rta'i 'khor lo'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-17: 'khor lo de gtso bor spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-18: de bzhin du nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-19: rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lo 'di la brten nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam tshol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-20: de bas na rnam pa 'di gnyis ni theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-22: de dag ni spyod pa dma' zhing zhan pa la rten pas theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-23: bdag phung po rnams spyod pa la 'dzin par byed pa dang bcas pa la skyo zhing 'jigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-24: bdag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir nan tan byed pa ma yin pas theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279a-25: bdag khams rnams spyod pa la gnas su bcas pas skyo zhing 'jigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-0: bdag sdug bsngal thams cad @279b las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-1: sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir nan tan byed pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-2: bdag skye mched mngon par 'du bya ba rnams spyod pa la sdud par byed pa dang bcas pas skyo zhing 'jigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-3: bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol ba tshol gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-4: sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir nan tan byed pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-5: de dag 'brel ba dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la 'brel ba'i dbang gis gnas shing brten nas gnas shing brten pa mngon par 'du byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-6: sems can thams cad sdud pa la mi dga' zhing byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-7: snying rje med de 'brel pa dang bcas pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-8: gzhan dag sdug bsngal mang po myong bar mthong yang yal bar btang ste mi skyo ba la bdag 'ba' zhig rnam par grol ba tshol ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-9: de dag bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mgo bcad pas sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mgo bcad pa la mi spro bas theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:279b-10: de dag theg pa chen po'i 'khor los byang chub la 'bab pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-0: de dag 'od chen po'i 'khor los byang chub la 'bab pa ma yin pas na theg pa chen po'i @280a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-2: de dag gcig pu zla med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba la dga' zhing nan tan byed pas na theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-4: sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la nan tan ma bya pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-6: brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa dag ni dbang po yongs su ma smin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-8: brtson 'grus chung ba dag la gal te shin tu zab mo theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos bstan na bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-9: nyan pa gnyis ka kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-10: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad la 'khus pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-12: sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la nan tan ma byas shing brtson 'grus ma brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-16: brtson 'grus chung ba dag shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos mnyan na sems can de ni yang dag par glen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-18: de ni bdag shes par khas 'che'ang chad pa'i mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-19: log pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba dang; rgyu med par smra zhing las kyi 'bras bu rnams la med par 'dzin pas dge ba byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280a-20: sdig pa byas pa thams cad la med par 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-0: theg pa chen po @280b la brdzun du smra zhing nga'i dam pa'i chos ma rungs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-1: chos ma yin pa la ni chos yin par 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-2: chos la ni chos ma yin par 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-3: dge sbyong ma yin pa la dge sbyong yin par 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-4: dge sbyong yang dag pa la ni dge sbyong ma yin par 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-5: 'dul ba ma yin pa la ni 'dul bar 'chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-6: 'dul ba yang dag pa la ni 'dul ba ma yin par 'chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-7: glen pa gti mug gi rang bzhin can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-9: ser snas yongs su bsten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-10: theg pa chen po'i chos la bstod cing srung ba dang; kun du rgyas par byed kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-11: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur nas rgyas par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-12: de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-14: bla na med pa yang dag pa'i theg pa la brten te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-15: khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs kyang dge slong nyid du 'gyur bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-16: dge ba'i chos thams cad mngon par sdud pa'i rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pas nga'i slob ma chos kyi snod du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-17: chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-19: mi slob pa la nan tan byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-20: mtha'i gnas byas pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:280b-21: dge ba'i skye bo tshul khrims srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-2: tshul khrims med pa dag la rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyo zhing gshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-6: 'tsho ba'i yo byad la spyod du mi ster ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-7: bzung zhing bcing pa'ang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-9: 'bras bu thams cad med par lta zhing chad par smra ba dag ni mi'i nang na gnas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-10: de ni yang dag par srin po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-11: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po grangs med pa'i bar du'ang mi'i lus thob par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-12: sems can dmyal bar tshad med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar yang sla yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-13: mi'i nang na chad par lta ba ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-14: de ltar gang zag glen pa de ni ring po mi thogs par lus kyi yan lag dum bur chad cing nyin zhag du mar lce lkugs shing smra mi nus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-15: shin tu mi bzad pa'i na ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-16: tsha ba'i sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-17: tshe 'phos nas gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung zhing ngan song kun tu 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor la sdug bsngal mang po len te thar pa'i dus med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-18: bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du'ang mi'i lus thob par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-19: gal te bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa 'das nas mi'i lus thob na'ang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281a-20: rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-3: nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-4: lus thung zhing mi sdug bas kun gyi yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-5: smra mi mkhas shing chig rnar mi 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-6: sems rtag tu myos shing ci'ang mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-7: dbul phongs pa'i rigs su skyes nas ci'ang mi rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi phrad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-9: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su sdig pa'i las byed pa la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-10: ngan par lta ba la chags shing mtshams med pa'i sdig pa byed pa la dga' bas phyir yang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-11: ngan song las shin tu thar par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-12: de ltar glen pa gti mug can chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-13: 'gog par smra ba des nga'i dam pa'i chos ma rung bar byas nas nga'i slob ma tshul khrims srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-15: tshul khrims med pa la nan tan gyis chad pas gcod cing dge ba'i phyogs la bde bar spyod du mi ster te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-16: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du ngan song du ltung nas mun pa nas mun par rgyu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-18: de ltar sems can de'i sdig pa rnam par smin pa ni nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:281b-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos mnyan pa la nan tan ma byas par shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos la nyan cing nan tan byed pa la rtsol ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-1: ltar glen pa gti mug can chad par lta bar smra ba de mi ma rabs tha ma'i lus kyang thob par dka' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-2: 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lta ci smos; nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang mi thob na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-4: shin tu zab bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-5: sems can de'i nyes pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ma bslabs par theg pa chen po'i chos la zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-9: rdza so ma btang ba'i nang du mar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-10: 'o ma blugs na thams cad 'thungs nas snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-11: bcud gnyi ga ma rung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-13: snod la skyon yod pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-14: de bzhin du sems can dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la shin tu nan tan ma byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-16: yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-17: dbang po yongs su ma smin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-19: brtson 'grus chung ba dag la gang gis shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos bshad na bshad pa dang nyan pa gnyi ga kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad la 'khus pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba ni gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-0: 'jig rten pa'i @282b bang mdzod zag pa zhig ral can gyi nang du nor rin po che bcug na chud zos shing stor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-1: de bzhin du sems can gang theg pa gnyis kyi chos la 'phya zhing skur te ma dad pa nan tan du mi slob pa dag la theg pa chen po bshad na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-2: de'i dbang gi sdig byed cing 'khor ba'i mtha' zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-4: gru zag pa bug rdol can skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-5: 'deg pa mi nus pa la zhon te rgya mtsho'i nang du 'jug pa de bzhin du sems can gang ser sna dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-6: phrag dog gi dbang du gyur pa theg pa gnyis kyi chos la nan tan ma byas par bdag ni theg pa chen po pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba de ni chad par lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-9: sgyus zag ba can du gyur pa'i lus kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-11: gang zag dmus long du gyur pa ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-12: de bzhin du nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa bag med pa stong par lta ba la chags shing theg pa gnyis mi slob pa'i shes rab kyi mig med pas dmus long du gyur pa ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i yon tan rin po che bstan pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:282b-14: lus shin tu mnam zhing rul par gyur pa la byug pa dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byugs kyang dri zhim par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-1: can glen pa gti mug can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-2: theg pa gnyis kyi chos la brtson par ma dad cing srog gcod pa ma spangs pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du ma spangs pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-3: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la nan tan byed kyang shin tu zab mo'i chos shes par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-5: gram khrod du sa bon bzang po btab ste shin tu las cher byas kyang 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-6: lo tog rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-7: de bzhin du sems can gang theg pa gnyis kyi chos la nga rgyal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-8: le lo byed de nan tan mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-9: 'dod pa lnga la chags te mi skyo bdag lus de nyid la theg pa chen po'i rigs su shin tu spyad dka' ba'i brtson 'grus byas kyang cir yang 'grub pa'i don med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-11: rdza ma sngar dug gi snod byas pa'i nang du phyis sha khar cung zad tsam btab pas spyad du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:283a-12: de bzhin du sems can gang theg pa gnyis kyi chos la nan tan mi byed pa rgyu med par smra ba la theg pa chen po bstan kyang bdag dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:288b-13: pha rol la yang dag par g-yo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:288b-14: sgyu med par bstod pa ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-5: sems can gang rang bzhin gyis gdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-8: gti mug gi rang bzhin can /
