K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-11: gzhan dag gi khe dang; bkur sti dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-13: grags pa rnyed pa mthong na phrag dog skyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-17: grags pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-18: bdag bstod cing gzhan la smod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-21: yid kyi las mi sdom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-22: sdig pa thams cad spyod pa la rtag tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-27: gzhan la 'tshe ba la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-28: bsod nams kyi zhing la bzang ngan du rnam par 'byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-29: nga'i bstan pa la zhugs pa rab tu byung ba la skyon tshol zhing gnod par glags lta ba la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-30: skyon cung zad tsam byung na bden nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-31: rdzun ma brtags par 'phya zhing skur te gshe zhing sbyo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-34: rab tu byung ba la 'tshe bar dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-35: bdag gi skyon la mi sems shing gzhan la 'phya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289a-36: theg pa chen po'i yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-0: bsnangs pa brjod @289b pa thos na 'tsho zhing 'jug pa'i sems skye mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-1: kha na ma tho ba'i sdig lci ba spyad pa la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-3: gzhan la bslu ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i chos la bdag nyan cing gzhan yang nyan du gzhug pa'i tshul ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-5: kha ton byed cing gzhan yang klog cing kha ton byed du 'jug pa'i tshul ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-6: bdag bstod pa'i phyir gzhan la smod pa de theg pa chen po'i chos la bsti stang dang bcas pas bstod kyang theg pa chen po'i spyod yul la nan tan du ma bslabs pas don khong du chud pa med par bdag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-9: bdag gi 'tsho ba btsal ba'i phyir gzhan bdag la gnas 'cha' zhing slob tu 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-11: tshul khrims nyams pa sdig pa spyod pa'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa lta bu bdag tshul khrims nyams la sdig pa spyod kyang khe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-12: grags pa'i phyir gzhan dag 'dul ba'i sde snod slob par gzhan 'debs pa de ltar g-yo dang gya gyur ldan la slu ba'i ngang can gyi sems can de dag ni mi'i lus tha ma'ang thob par dka' zhing mtho ris kyi lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-13: theg pa gnyis kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang nyams te mi tho ba na theg pa chen po thob pa lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:289b-14: de 'chi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar ltung te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-0: thar ba'i dus med pas mkhas pa dag gis de la bsten par mi @290a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-3: ngo tsha ba med par 'khor mang po'i nang du khe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-4: bkur sti'i phyir nga ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes sengge'i sgra sgrogs pas glen pa gti mug can dag dang bsnyen cing gros su byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-7: bong bus sengge'i pags pa gyon te bdag ni seng ge'i zhes khas 'che bas mi zhig gis rgyang nas mthong na; de seng ge nyid yin par 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-8: de nas des sgra phyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-9: thams cad kyis bong bu yin par shes nas kun gyis mtshil mas btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-11: 'di ko mi gtsang ba za ba'i sdig to bong bu lta na zhes ti nan pa sna tshogs kyis smad de dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-12: de ltar na de bzhin du ngas bshad pa'i gang zag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spyod pa la spro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-14: mi thams cad kyi sa bon bsreg pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos las kyang phyir ldog pa yin na theg pa chen po'i snod du 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-17: de ltar glen pa gtig mug can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin te bdag theg pa chen po pa'o zhes pha rol la sgyus brjod cing khe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-18: bkur sti sdug pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290a-20: rkang lag med pa'i mi glen pa zhig dgra la brgal ba'i phyir g-yul du zhugs kyang bdag nyon mongs pa las don du 'grub pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-0: de ltar de bzhin du theg pa chen po par sgyus khas 'che ba de'ang @290b 'di ltar dad pa'i lag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-1: tshul khrims kyi rkang pa ma tshang bar rang gi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-2: spyod pa la mi dpog cing nyon mongs pa'i g-yul chen po la rgol bar chas pa ni ba nyon mongs pa tsam las don du mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-3: gang zag de sgo gsum mi sdom par sdig pa 'ba' zhig spyod cing bdag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes khas 'che'ang theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi snod ma yin pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dgra shin tu gnas pa tshoms par ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-4: sems can thams cad la 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston par ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-5: 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du dgod pa'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-8: theg pa chen po zhes bya ba ni phul du gyur pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag par srung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-9: phul du gyur pa'i dge ba'i mchog spyod par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-10: phul du gyur pa'i khrel pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-12: 'jig rten phyi ma'i sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu la shin tu lta zhing 'jigs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-13: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spong zhing dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan byed pa la spro ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-15: snying rjes sems can thams cad la khyab pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-16: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:290b-17: bde ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rtsol ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-0: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las sgrol zhing 'don @291a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-1: pa'o; ;bdag gis lus kyi bde ba la mi lta bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-2: bde ba'i don stobs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-3: de dag ni theg pa chen po la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-5: mtshan nyid gang dag dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya ba zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-6: gang dag yang dag pa'i dran pa la bde bar gnas shing ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog pas rtag tu brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-8: sgyu spangs shing las kyi 'bras bu la yid ches pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-9: 'dod pa lnga la mi chags shing 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-10: mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba la shin tu brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-13: skye mched la shin tu rtog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-14: 'phags pa'i rigs la bde bar gnas par rtag tu mos pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-15: mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-16: gang zag 'di rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod du'ang mi 'gyur na theg pa chen po'i snod du 'gyur ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-18: mtshan nyid gtang dag dang ldan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-19: sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi yon tan de dag thams cad dang yang ldan la gzhan yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291a-20: yang du mi rtag par rjes su rtog pa la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-0: skye zhing 'gog @291b pa la yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-1: yang du rjes su rtog pa la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-2: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'gog pa'i chos can du shin tu rtog pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-3: mtshan nyid 'di dang ldan na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-4: sems can de theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa; gal te dge ba'i rgyal rigs rgyal po dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-6: rje'u rigs dmangs rigs shin tu dge ba'i bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-7: dad la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bcu bsgoms nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-8: nyan thos theg pa'i snod du de 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-9: rang rgyal theg pa'i sgo gsum rnam par dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-10: khrul dang 'dzem dang ldan zhing phung pos 'jigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-11: nyes pa'i skyon shes bas mtha'i gnas la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-12: dran pas dbang po srung zhing sems kyang zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-13: rten cing 'brel pa rtogs pas bsam gtan sgom /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-14: phung po khams dang skye mched rtogs la mkhas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-15: gnas dang spyod lam 'khor lo 'di bcus na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-16: theg pa mchog gi snod 'gyur srid mtsho rgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-17: theg pa gsum min gnyis kyi 'khor lo yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-18: bdag nyid nyon mongs rnam par grol rtsol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-19: bag chags mi gtong sems can ma sgrol ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-20: gang zag da ni theg chen snod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-21: byis pa dbang po zhan pa'i le lo can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-22: theg pa gnyis la nan tan mi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:291b-23: theg pa chen po'i 'khor lo ldan mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-0: @292a *// de ni rgya chen theg chen snod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-1: byis pa gcig pu rnam par grol tshol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-2: blo dang spyod par zhan cing byams sems med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-3: chad par lta la chags pa ngan song gzhol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-4: yang dag chos spong chos ma yin pa ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-5: theg pa gnyis la skur cing sdom pa spong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-6: bsnyen par rdzogs shing theg chen khas 'che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-7: nga yi chos 'jig sems can kun la slu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-8: de yi dbang gis mi lus thob par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-9: nga yi bstan la zhugs pa'i 'phags pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-10: ngur smrig gyon la 'tshe'am gnod byed dam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-11: gshe'am spyos sam lhung bzed gos phrogs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-12: lha dang mi yi bde ba yun du stor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-13: de bas gang zhig mi lus thob 'dod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-14: 'chi ba'i dus na lkugs pa'i skyon spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-15: rtag tu sangs rgyas kun dang phrad 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-16: theg gsum chos rnams kun tu bsrung bar byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-17: theg pa gsum las theg pa mchog 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-18: theg pa gsum chos rtog la mkhas pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-19: dga' zhing spro bas gzhan la rgyas ston na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-20: nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur la the tshom spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-21: tshol khrims nyams shing 'dzungs pa nga rgyal can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-22: bdag bstod gzhan smod theg chen khas 'che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-23: de dag spangs te mkhas la bsten par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-24: nges par 'tshang rgya khams gsum 'da' bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292a-25: theg pa gsum las gang dang mthun pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-0: byams @292b dang snying rje'i theg pa gsum chos ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-1: mi de bzhin du yongs su rdzogs byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-2: nges par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur la the tshom spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-3: phung po khams dang skye mched zhi bar shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-4: nam mkha' bzhin du ci la'ang mi gnas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-5: chos bstan sems can mang po kun yang sdud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-6: dpag med ye shes blo gros dam pa thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-7: tshul khrims nyams par dga' la sdig pa can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-8: theg pa chen po'i yon tan mchog thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-9: khe dang grags phyir theg khas 'che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-10: bong bu seng ge'i bags pa gyon pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-11: deng 'dir thams cad 'khor la bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-12: gang zhig myur du byang chub mchog 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-13: dge bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-14: nga yi chos la mi smad shin tu bsrung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-15: ngas sngon mdo sde gzhan dag las gsungs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-16: byang chub chen po 'dod pas theg chen spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-17: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa spongs shig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-18: de ni rnam dag 'khor lo bstan pa'i chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-19: sangs rgyas tshad med bye ma mchod byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-20: sdig pa spangs nas rnam dag sems sbyong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-21: shin tu brtson ba'i skye bo de dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-22: gnyis su med de theg pa gcig pu bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-23: da lta'i 'khor 'di theg pa gsum snod can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-24: la la nyan thos theg pa'i chos dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-25: las kyi dngos po mang pos 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-26: de ni byang chub mchog gi snod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:292b-27: la la dbang par dga' zhing rang byang chub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-0: de yang byang chub mchog gi @293a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-2: la la ye shes mchog la bkod 'os pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-3: de bas mos pa bzhin du theg gsum shod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-4: sbyangs pa'i yon tan tsam gyis grol 'dod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-5: theg chen bshad pa thos na ngan song ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-6: bad kan nad la 'o ma 'thung bcug bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-7: de phyir dug tu 'gyur gyi nad mi sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-8: de bzhin snod min nyan thos theg pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-9: theg chen bshad pa thos na rmongs 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-10: chad par smra la ngan song ltung 'gyur bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-11: de bas dbang po brtags te chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-12: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-14: spyad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-15: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na sems can tshad med pa brgya stong snyed sngon chos thos pa las yid gol te stong pa yin par go nas rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-16: 'bras bu med par lta zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba dag mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas phyir yang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-17: de nas de dag 'dug pa las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'dzem pa bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293a-19: so sor bshags pa bya ba'i phyir thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag btsal nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-2: bdag cag sngon nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa las nyan thos kyi theg pa de'ang yongs su ma smin par rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-3: de la'ang rmongs shing mngon du ma gyur pas stong par lta zhing rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-5: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-7: yid kyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las tshad med pa bgyis pas ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba las deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas slar yang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed de shin tu 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-8: ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis so sor bshags te ma bcabs pas de dag yongs su byang bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-9: deng slan chad ji snyed sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-10: bdag cag gi sdig pa de dag yongs su spyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-13: thugs brtse bas rjes su gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-14: bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las thugs brtse bas bskyab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-15: bdag cag slar yang sngon spyad pa'i nyan thos kyi theg ba la spyod cing nan tan bgyid kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-17: thugs brtse ba'i slad du bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:293b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-1: ngo tsha bas so sor bshags pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-2: nga'i bstan pa la ma nyams pa'i skyes bu dam pa gnyis yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-3: gcig ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag cing thog ma nas nyes pa mi byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-4: gcig ni nyes pa byas su zin kyang 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-5: ngo tsha bas so sor 'chags pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-6: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni nga'i chos la shin tu 'dun pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi mos pa bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-8: 'khor de'i nang na la las ni bzod pa tha ma thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-9: la las ni bzod pa bar ma thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-10: la las ni bzod pa mchog thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-11: la las ni 'jig rten gyi mchog gi chos thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-12: la las ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-13: la las ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-14: la las ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-16: dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong zag pa thams cad zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294a-18: blo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i dgra bcom par gyur nas dga' bzhin du sangs rgyas la phyag btsal te phyir yang so sor stan la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294b-0: yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis sngon thos pa'i chos stong pa yin par 'khrul nas rgyu @294b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad nas ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ba nas mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas phyir yang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed de 'dug pa las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:294b-6: bdag cag sngon rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa las rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod du'ang yongs su ma smin par theg pa chen po'i chos thos nas dad pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298a-19: sangs rgyas de re re dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de re re la'ang chos kyi rnam grangs tshad med pa snyed mnyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298a-21: thos nas shin tu nan tan bgyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298a-22: shin tu spyad dka' ba tshad med pa dag spyad kyang las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pas bdag cag shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan las 'da' ba ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298a-23: bdag cag ting 'dzin gyi sgo'i khyad par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-0: yon tan @298b yang ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-1: bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdo sde bshad pa 'di thos nas lhag par shin tu 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-3: mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis so sor 'chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-4: yongs su byang bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-5: deng slan chad ji snyed sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-7: thugs brtse ba can gyis bdag cag gi sdig pa de dag yongs su byang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-8: slan chad mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-9: bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-10: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba myur du thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-11: ting 'dzin gyi sgo'i yon tan gyi khyad par thob par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:298b-14: bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas chos kyi snod dang; chos kyi snod ma yin pa la tshig rtsub po zhe gcod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe zhing gnod pa bgyis pas bdag cag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du ngan song du lhung bar gyur pa nas de bzhin du gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-0: sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas chos kyi @299a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-2: chos kyi snod ma yin pa la gzhu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-4: gnod par bgyid pas mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du ngan song du lhung bar gyur pa nas de bzhin du gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-7: bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas chos kyi snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-8: chos kyi snod ma yin pa'i chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-9: lhung bzed phrogs pas mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du ngan song du lhung bar gyur pa nas de bzhin du gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-12: bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gis nye gnas chos kyi snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-13: chos kyi snod ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs phrogs te bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-14: btung ba phrogs shing bar chad byas pas mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du ngan song du lhung ba nas de bzhin du gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299a-17: bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas chos kyi snod dang; chos kyi snod ma yin pa dag gi chos gos phrogs nas khyim par phab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-0: las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug pas mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med @299b pa'i bar du ngan song du lhung pa nas de bzhin du gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-1: de la kha cig ni 'di skad du bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-2: chos kyi snod ma yin pa dag nyes pa byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-3: nyes pa ma byas pa la lcags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-5: shing sgrog tu bcug ste gtses pas mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du bdag cag ngan song du lhung bas nas de bzhin du gong du rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-8: bdag cag sngon bcom ldan 'das che ge mo zhig gi nye gnas rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-9: chos kyi snod ma yin pa dag la dbang za ba'i sems kyis 'tshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-10: gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mi bde bar bgyis pas bdag cag mi dge ba'i las de'i dbang gis bskal pa tshad med pa'i bar du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-11: phyis sangs rgyas tshad med pa dag la bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa snyed de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:299b-18: sangs rgyas de re re dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de re re la'ang shin tu 'dzem pa dang bcas pas mi dge bas las de dag so sor @300a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-2: sangs rgyas de re re dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de re re lus kyang tshad med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs mnyan te thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-4: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-5: shin tu spyad dka' ba spyad kyang las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pas bdag cag da dung shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-6: ting 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi sgo'i khyad par ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-7: bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdo sde 'di thos nas lhag par shin tu 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-8: mi 'chab pas so sor bshags te yongs su byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-9: deng slan chad ji snyed sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las rnams mi bgyid par yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-11: thugs brtse ba can gyis bdag cag gi sdig pa de dag yongs su byang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-12: slan chad mi bgyid par rjes su gzung du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-13: bdag cag ma 'ongs pa na ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rjes bskyab tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-15: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bde ba myur du thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yon tan gyi khyad par thob par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i @300b 'khor de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-3: khyed 'di ltar shin tu 'dzem pa dang bcas pas so sor bshags pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-4: yongs su ma nyams pa'i skyes bu dam pa gnyis yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-5: gcig ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing thog ma nas nyes pa mi byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-6: gcig ni nyes pa byas su zin kyang 'dzem pa dang bcas pas so sor 'chags pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-7: skyes bu 'di gnyis ni nga'i bstan pa la shin tu 'dun pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-9: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas la gnod pa byas pa'i sdig pa'i gan na god du bshad pa'i mtshams med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-10: nye ba'i sdig pa ni ming tsam du zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-11: sdig pa zhes kyang mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-12: sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas rab tu byung ba la gnod pa byas na de'i sdig pa ni gong du bshad pa'i mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa las tshad med grangs med pas lhag par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-14: dge slong gang tshul khrims nyams te sdig pa byed kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la mya ngan las 'da' ba phyin ci ma log pa'i lam ston nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-15: sems can mang po la yon tan chen po'i rin po che'i gter du 'gyur ba nas de bzhin du ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-16: tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i chos spyod pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:300b-17: de bas na gang gis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i slob ma la 'tshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-1: de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gcod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-2: de ni sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig bcar ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-3: de ni ngas sngon shin tu dka' ba spyad nas rnyed pa'i dam pa'i chos ma rungs par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-4: de ni sems can thams cad la shin tu gnod pa chen po byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-5: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba la gnod pa byas na de'i sdig pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa bas tshad med grangs med pas lhag par che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-6: de bas na khyed kyis deng nga'i mdun du shin tu bsam pa dag cing lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang 'bad par bcas pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-7: sngon mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad so sor bshags pa'i phyir khyed la thugs rje chen pos rjes su bzung bas khyed kyi sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad khad kyis byang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba thams cad la'ang khyed kyis 'di bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan sngar yang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad shin tu so sor shogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-9: ma 'ongs pa'i nyes pa'ang shin tu bsrung bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301a-10: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong gi tha ma snang mdzad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-0: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @301b sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-2: zhabs su ldan pa; bde bar gshegs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-4: bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-7: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar yang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad shin tu so sor shogs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-8: lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-9: de'i tshe nyan thos de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-10: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-13: bdag cag gal te 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong gi tha ma snang mdzad kyi tshe yang dag pa'i lta ba thob cing log par lta ba rnam par spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-14: sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par 'byang zhing sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-15: bdag cag bskal pa bzang po 'di la mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-16: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong na'ang bzod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-20: khyed kyis 'di ltar rtul phod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-21: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-22: smon lam gyi mthus gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas snang mdzad kyi tshe sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-23: lhag pa'i bsam pas bsti stang dang bcas te bsnyen bkur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:301b-24: mchod pa gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-1: pa snang mdzad kyis kyang gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa'i dgra bcom par 'gyur bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-2: gdon mi za bar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i yon tan gyi khyad par thob par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-3: de nas nyan thos de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas phyir yang so so'i stan la 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-7: ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten thams cad la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-8: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir tshad med grangs med bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyi rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-9: bram ze gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-10: blon po gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-11: khyim bdag gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-12: tshong dpon gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-13: dge sbyong gdol pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-16: gdol pa can gyi skyes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-17: bud med la sogs pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu bskyed pas mi'i lus thob tu zin kyang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang sten cing log pa'i lta ba bskyed pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis nga'i bla na med pa'i dam pa'i chos shin tu zab mo 'jig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302a-18: nga'i bstan pa rgyas par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-0: @302b rgyas pa rnams med par byed cing mos pa mi skyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-1: ngas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-3: bar chad byed cing rgyas par mi byed pa dang bar bar ni ngas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-5: bar chad byed cing rgyas par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-6: bar bar ni ngas bstan pa'i bla na med pa'i theg pa can gyi dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing skur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-8: bar chad byed cing rgyas par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-9: bar bar ni ngas bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-10: chos kyi snod ma yin pa la zhe sdang skyed cing gshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-13: tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnod par glags lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-15: yon tan bcas nas nyes pa bsgrags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-16: de bzhin du smod pa'i sems kyis 'tshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-17: gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-18: de ltar gang zag 'phags pa'i chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa de'ang yang dag par glen zhing gti mug gi rang bzhin can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-19: cung zad tsam gyi shes pa snyems pa'i nga rgyal can de 'di nas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:302b-20: tshad med pa snyed kyi shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-0: bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du mi'i lus thob par dka' ba nas de bzhin du rgyas par gong du bshad @303a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-3: sems can de mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-4: sdug bsngal chen po myong yang sla yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-5: de lta bu'i lus kyi sdig pa can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-6: sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing mi dge ba'i las byed pas 'khor bar 'khor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-7: shin tu bsgral dka' ba rtag tu 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-8: de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na blo gros chen po can gyi sems can tshad med grangs med pa snyed stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-10: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-12: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi sems can 'di dag mi'i lus shin tu thob par dka' ba rnyed kyang dad pa yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-13: yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-14: yang dag pa'i mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-15: yang dag pa'i lta ba yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-19: tshul khrims dag pa yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-20: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303a-21: yang dag pa'i shes rab yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303b-0: sems can 'di dag @303b shin tu thob par dka' ba'i mi'i lus thob mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303b-1: glen pa mi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:303b-2: nga rgyal gyi dbang gis ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i sdig lci ba rnams kun bgyid de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-5: dkon mchog gsum la rim gro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-6: bsti stang byed cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la'ang 'phya zhing skur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-9: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas tshul khrims can nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-14: gos ngur smrig gyon pa thams cad la 'tshe ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-21: 'tsho ba'i yo byed phrogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-22: chos gos phrogs te khyim par phab nas las byed du bcug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-23: btson rar btsug pa nas 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:308b-25: dge 'dun gyi nor mi 'phrog ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-0: ngan pa sdig pa can dag rab tu byung ba la 'tshe ba @309a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-1: dang; gnod pa byed du mi 'dzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi nor la 'phrog cing spyod du mi 'dzud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-3: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la bsti stang dang bcas pas mnyan cing gzungs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-4: mnyan te gzungs su bzung nas kyang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su brtson 'grus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-6: ngas bstan pa'i theg pa gsum gyis 'phags pa'i nye gnas dag la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-8: bsti stang dang bcas pas g-yog byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-9: theg pa chen po la shin tu brtan pa'i yi dam bcas te the tshom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-10: phyir ldog pa'i sems mi skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-12: sems can dag theg pa chen po la dad cing yid ches pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-14: slob pa nan tan byed du 'jug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-15: rgyal rigs gdol pa can 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-17: bdag nyid che ba'i gdol pa can dag ni snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rgyal thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod du gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309a-20: nor dbyig thams cad la spyod kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba nas ngan song gzhan gyi bar du'ang ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-0: de ni ngas rgyal thabs kyi dbang @309b skur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-1: de ltar na de dag ni grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-2: grong khyer na spyod kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba nas ngan song gzhan du'ang mi ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-3: sems can gang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par byang bar 'dod na ngas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan du bslab cing gzungs su gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-4: gang gis de ltar dge 'dun gyi mngon sum du gyur pa la shin tu 'dzem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-5: ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis sdig pa'i las so sor bshags na sngon gyi dus na byas pa'i sdig pa'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-7: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-10: ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-11: ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-12: ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:309b-13: ji ltar na theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-1: pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-2: ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongs su 'phel bar bgyid pa lags ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-3: chos kyi snod ma lags pa'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-4: chung du na chos gos kyi tshal bu 'tshal zhing skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-5: kha spu bregs pa thams cad la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-6: ji ltar na theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'bar zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-7: ji ltar na rno ba'i shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-8: bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-9: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-12: sa rnams la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-13: ji ltar na rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal cing rjes su mthun par 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-14: ji ltar na rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-15: nyan thos kyi nye gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-16: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-18: bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310a-19: ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rab tu brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-0: ji ltar na byang chub kyi @310b spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs la sems mi ngoms pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-4: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-5: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro; ;rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-6: theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-7: theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-10: chos kyi snod ma yin pa'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-11: chung du na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-12: kha spu bregs pa thams cad la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-13: theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:310b-15: bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-1: la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-2: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-3: rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-5: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-7: bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-9: byang chub kyi spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-10: smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-11: sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci byas pa thams cad 'phags pa'i chos kyi ye shes rdo rje ltar sra la rno bas lhag ma ma lus par bcom ste rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-12: gsar du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-14: sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-15: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun nan tan byed pa la skyo zhing sgyid lug ba med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-16: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams 'jil pa la skyo zhing sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311a-17: gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-0: 'khor los @311b bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ni gar 'gro'ang rin po che'i 'khor lo thog mar 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-1: rin po che gzhan de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-2: gling bzhi kun tu rgyu zhing sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-3: sems kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang bsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-4: sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-5: sems kyi bde ba'ang skye zhing 'phel bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de bzhin du 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-7: sems can thams cad kyi rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-8: gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-11: shing rta chen po ni 'khor lo bzhi dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-12: mi mang po de'i nang du 'dug nas lam chen por 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-21: 'bras bu ji snyed yod pa thams cad shing rta'i 'khor lo de'i 'og tu song nas thams cad chag cing grugs te nor du mi rung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-22: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-23: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-24: chos kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bcom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:311b-25: rnam par smin pa mi len par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-1: cig 'phangs pas phas rgol ba'i dgra'i mgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-3: de spyod pa'i mthu med par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan na rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po thams cad 'jom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-6: sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-7: rnam par smin pa len par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-10: me'i bskal pa byung ba'i tshe nyi ma lnga gcig car shar nas gling bzhi'i klung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-13: chu'i khams su gtogs pa gsher ba thams cad gang yang mi skems pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-14: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan na rgyu ba bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-15: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-16: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-18: sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar smin pa thams cad yongs su skems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-21: rlung gi bskal pa byung ba'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas rlung chen po dus gcig tu langs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na ri bo che chung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312a-22: sa chen po rnams thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di @312b bcu dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-1: nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad mi shigs pa gang yang med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-2: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-3: sems can gyi sgrib pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-5: sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-8: seng ge'i rgyal po ral pa can gyi skad thang cig phyung bas gcan gzan thams cad 'phur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-9: 'gro ba thams cad skrag cing 'gul mi nus par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sgra thang cig bsgrags pas mu stegs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-11: log par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs su gyur pa thams cad 'jig skrag nas smra ba'i tshig 'khrul zhing 'dri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-15: brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe lha'i dmag gis bskor cing lag na rdo rje thogs te g-yul du zhugs na lha ma yin thams cad skrag pas ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-16: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na log par lta ba'i mu stegs can thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:312b-17: log par ston pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-3: dbul phongs pa'i sems can thams cad la sbyin pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-4: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-5: rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyal mtshan la gnas na chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pas sems can tshad med pa snyed thams cad la sbyin pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-8: mtshan mo'i dus su 'jig rten kun mun par gyur pas 'thom zhing 'brog bslad pa na zla ba nya ba shar bas mun pa thams cad bsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-9: 'brog bslad pa rnams kyi lam mtshon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na sems can gang ma rig pa'i mun pas ldongs te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad stor ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-11: ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-12: chos kyi snang ba skyes pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313a-13: zag pa thams cad bcad nas sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-0: nyi ma'i dkyil @313b 'khor chen po 'jig rten du shar ba na lo tog thams cad skye zhing 'phel te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-3: lo ma thams cad rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-4: mnam zhing btsog pa thams cad sel ba dang; lo tog gi 'bru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-5: sman gyi 'bras bu thams cad smin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-6: gangs kyi ri bo kun zhu bas 'babs chu kun brug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-7: rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-8: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-9: lhag pa'i sbyin pa la gnas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-11: bde ba'i bzod pa dang; brtson 'grus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-17: spobs pa'i yon tan shin tu rgyas shing sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-18: chos de'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag pa'i lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-19: lhag pa'i spyod pa pa dam pa'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-20: lo ma rnam pa sna tshogs shin tu rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-21: nyon mongs pa'i las ngan pa thams cad yongs su sel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-23: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:313b-25: nga rgyal gyi ri bo thams cad zhu zhing 'bab pas yang dag pa'i dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:314a-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi chu rim gyis 'bab cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgya mtsho 'gengs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:314a-2: sems can thams cad yid bzhin du 'jigs pa med pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-3: yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-5: tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-9: bdag gir lta ba thams cad mongs su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-10: shin tu tshe ring ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-11: theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-13: sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-14: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-15: sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-16: bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la rtsod pa med pas yongs su rgyas par byed cing bgegs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-19: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:333b-21: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa @334a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-3: theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-4: theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-5: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-7: chos kyi snod ma yin pa la'ang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-8: chung du na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing skra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-9: kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-10: theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-12: bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-16: sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-17: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-18: rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-20: nyan thos nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-21: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang; dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-22: bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334a-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-0: byang chub @334b kyi spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-3: 'bras bu gzhan 'thob pa'ang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-7: snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su spongs nas thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags shing bstod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-8: sems can thams cad la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-10: byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-11: sems can thams cad kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-12: nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-13: ngan song gsum bskam par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bas ba par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-15: khams gsum gyi srid pa yongs su gcad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-18: skye mched gcad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:334b-19: thams cad myur du 'jigs pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du gzung ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su spong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-2: gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ma bsgrubs par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-3: chung du na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang mi srung bar nga ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-4: nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-5: gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par smra ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-8: ngo tsha ba med pa'ang stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-9: glen pa mi shes pa slu ba can yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-10: de tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-11: rigs kyi bu; gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-12: mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-13: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgoms pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-14: nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-15: mya ngan las 'das par thob du zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can thams cad byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335a-16: mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-0: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa @335b ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-2: mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-4: gal te sems skyed pa tsam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-5: smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-6: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mi dgos par byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-7: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thob tu zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-9: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-10: 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-12: rigs kyi bu; gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-16: smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-17: mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-19: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'don mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-21: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:335b-22: bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-1: bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched steng gi bar du yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-2: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang yod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-5: de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-9: gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan te; mi dge ba bcu'i sngom pa la mi gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-10: gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul du chud par 'dod dam; myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-11: myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na sngar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-13: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-14: yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-16: 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336a-17: de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @336b kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-1: srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-3: dge bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan tan la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-4: le lo ma byed brtson par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-5: theg pa gsum gyis dam chos dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-6: theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-7: rab tu byung ba thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-9: theg chen spyod la dad mos shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-11: chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-12: byang chub chen po myur du 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-13: gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-14: kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-15: rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-16: bde zhing skyid la gnod pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-17: skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-18: sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-19: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-20: myur du bla med byang chub 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-21: ma byin len pa yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-22: mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-23: 'dod chags skye ba'i lam kun zhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-25: skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-26: sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-27: rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-29: 'dod pas log g-yem yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-30: nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:336b-31: 'dod chags srid pa'i mtsho yang skems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-0: rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur @337a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-2: sems can rnam pa mang po yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-4: theg chen la ni rab bkod nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-5: tshangs pa'i spyad la spyod du btsud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-6: brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-8: rtag tu bden pa smra bar dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-10: tshig gcig tshad mar btsugs pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-11: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-12: rdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-13: byang chub chen po myur du 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-14: phra ma'i tshig smra yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-15: dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-16: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-17: chad par lta bar yod mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-18: 'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-19: rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-20: zab mo chos kyi rgya mtshor rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-21: myur du bla med byang chub 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-22: gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-23: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i tshig smras na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-24: sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-25: snga ma'i mi dge las kyang zhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-26: 'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-28: sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-30: kyal bar smra ba yongs spangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-31: mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337a-32: gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-0: @337b rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-2: sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-4: gal te chags sems yongs spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-5: 'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-6: dur smrig gyon la mchod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-7: theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-8: rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-9: ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-10: bla med theg pa la zhon te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-11: rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-12: gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-13: gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-14: mnyam par bzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-16: rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-17: nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-18: de la gnas na byang chub 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-19: gnod sems thams cad spang bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-20: ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-21: rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsgoms na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-22: theg gsum ston la mos byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-23: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed; ;ngan song gsum las yongs thar te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-27: dge ba bcu yi las lam gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-28: byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-29: snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:337b-30: sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-2: ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-3: sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-4: myur du byang chub chen po thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-5: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-6: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa de go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-12: rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:338a-13: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:353a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:354a-8: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:354a-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:354a-23: 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:354b-13: de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pas ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:354b-17: sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:354b-19: thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:355a-0: ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul @355a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:364a-14: chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:364b-9: 'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:364b-17: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na zhag gcig gam; zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:364b-18: ting nge 'dzin de las langs na'ang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:364b-20: gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365a-0: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar @365a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365a-2: lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pa skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365a-3: ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365a-4: dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365a-7: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365b-1: gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun su mtshogs par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365b-3: sems can ma yin pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:365b-11: gal te na zhag bdun nam /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368a-8: gzugs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368a-9: nyon mongs pa srab cing chung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368a-10: theg pa chen po la bde bar gnas pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa; chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368a-12: nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcad par bya //
