K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368b-17: sangs rgyas mtshan dang ldan pa'i sems can dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368b-18: sangs rgyas zhing der yongs su gang bar 'gyur thams cad sangs rgyas theg la 'dun pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368b-19: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yongs su spong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368b-20: 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:368b-21: bsod nams kyi zhing gi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil @369a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-1: 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms pa dag deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la nan tan bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad pa thos nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-3: sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams chos 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi 'tsho ba me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-5: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dpa' bar 'gro ba glog gi 'od la rten pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo mo thams cad thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-7: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas chos la sgyur ba 'od snang ba las rten par byed pa rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thams cad thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-9: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas rdul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369a-10: dri ma dang bral te chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369b-0: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das @369b kyis bshad pa thos nas lan gcig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369b-2: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369b-4: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas mchog gi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369b-6: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas khams gsum gyi btson ra nas 'byung bar rtsom pas bcom ldan 'das la rten cing rab tu byung nas yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369b-8: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas shing nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:369b-10: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-0: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas nam 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde bar gnas nas theg pa chen por sems bskyed cing bla na med pa @370a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-3: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-4: yang dag par lta ba de'i dbang gis ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-6: nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas mtho ris su 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-7: yang dag pa'i smon lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-8: dge ba'i las thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-10: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-11: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-12: chos thos pa la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-13: dge 'dun gyi g-yog byed pa la mos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-14: nyin mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems bar chad med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-16: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas log pa la 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-17: log pa la phyogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-19: las ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370a-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'gyur ba'i dad pa thob nas khyim na gnas pa'i chos yongs su spangs te rnam par dag pas rab tu byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-0: de nas bcom ldan @370b 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-2: ngas sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba brda sprod pa chen po chos kyi sgo mo 'di khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-3: khyod kyis gzungs su zungs la shin tu rgyas par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-4: sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-8: yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus bsrungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-9: yun ring por phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-10: bde ba'i don thob par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-14: bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te nyams par mi bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-15: gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-17: log par phyogs pa las bsrungs te mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spang bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-19: ngag la gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-21: skur pa thams cad las bsrungs te med par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-23: spyod pa thams cad nyams par mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-24: de la mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-26: dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-27: mi dge ba thams cad yongs su sel bar srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:370b-28: de la dus ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-2: rims thams cad mi 'byung bar srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-3: de la 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na'ang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-4: de tshe 'phos nas kyang bde 'gror skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-6: bde ba'i don thob par yongs su srung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-8: sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-10: don yid la byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-12: yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcu shin tu bsrungs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-14: chos rnam pa 'di bcus yun ring por phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-19: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs su 'dzin cing shin tu rgyas par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-20: sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la klog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-22: don yid la bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-23: pha rol po la rgya cher ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-24: yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dag la bdag gis chos rnam pa 'di bcus shin tu bsrungs te yun ring por phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371a-27: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-0: @371b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-3: tshangs pa chen po lha'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-13: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-14: 'dus pa chen po las byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-15: bde ba'i don thob pa yongs su gdams pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-16: 'dus pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-17: rgya'i mkhan po ha shang zab mo la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-065-002:371b-18: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
